column2: {playername}, I've been watching you and I am quite impressed with your progress.^ I've spoken to the men and they agree with my decision.
Thank you, my {reg3?Lady:Lord}, I try my best to bring honour to your house.^ What decision is that?

You will now be one of my {s5}, commanding a group of 7 men. Your new salary should cover theirs, so will the improved rations I will be giving you.^ Also, as a symbol of your new authority, I will reward you a choice of a two things.^ {s6}, both made by my personal blacksmith.
I choose the shield. I will not let you nor the men down. You can count on me.
I choose the weapon. I will not let you nor the men down. You can count on me.
Good to hear it, {playername}. I'll have someone deliver it to you. Now go and meet your men.
{playername}, You have once again truly proved your worth. You are an example to all of our men.
Thank you, my {reg3?Lady:Lord}. A soldier is only as good as their commander.

From now on, you will be my {s5}, commanding a group of 15 men. You will also be given a considerable wage increase, as befit your station.^ I have also something to give you, choose between {s6}, straight from our family's treasures...^
The armour will help me defend you from your enemies. I will continue bringing honour to your house.
The weapon will help me destroy your enemies. I will continue bringing honour to your house.
I know you will, {playername}. Now go and meet your men.
You are back, {playername}.
{playername}, I am here to tell you that your vacation is over. Join me and return to your post.
Ha! Good fight, good fight! Exactly what the men were looking for. We should do this more, eh?
Alright, we've entertained the men, now for the good stuff. Pay up!
...blood and guts everywhere, then the rats eat the blood and guts! At least they are feasting, eh! Unlike us, covered with blood, guts, and shit!{s5}
{playername}, I have a task for you.

{playername}, as you are probably well aware, some of are troops are unhappy. Whether it is the losses we have suffered, or perhaps a lack of beer or ale, there are rumblings among the men.This cannot stand. I want you to go and placate them. Do what you must, as long as we can continue on without this air of dissatisfaction.
I will do what I can to pacify the men.
I cannot accept this mission.
Very good. I look forward to hearing back from you.
That is unfortunate, {playername}. Perhaps you are one of the unhappy ones too... Go back to your post.
Perhaps I can change your mind... (Persuasion + Leadership Check)
Good. I'll let the commander know.
I am sorry that I cannot convince you. I'll let the commander know.
So, the men wants to have fun? They want a bit of entertainment? (Duel)

So, the men wants to have fun? They want a bit of entertainment? Well, we can give them a show right now. You and I have a friendly duel, and if I win, convince the men to stop their grumbling. If you win, well, I'll pay the men 15 crowns each. What do you say?
Sounds good. With weapons or fists?
Weapons.
Fists.
Let's begin then! En garde!
Let's begin then! Put em up!
Definitely. Now that the fun is over, the men seems to be in better spirits. I'll let the commander know. Good fight.
Good fight... I am a man of my word. Here, distribute it to the men.
Good fight... I am a man of my word. But I do not have enough... here, take all that I have
Well, it so happens that I have some booze that we can all share. What do you say?
Now you are talking! Let the merry-making begin!
If crowns are what the men want, crowns are what I can offer. How much do you think the men want?

Now we are talking, eh? Beer is expensive, at {reg4} for a few cases, and there are quite a lot of us men that would like to drink and enjoy ourselves. So we think {reg6} crowns should cover it and whatever extras we want.
I see... I have that amount. Here are your {reg6} crowns. Spend it wisely, and no more grumblings.
I see... I do not have enough money.
I see... I do know a place where we can get your beer for cheaper. Here, for {reg6} crowns, you will get everything you need.
Great! Let us go buy it now and distribute it to the men. Once they are all drunk, there will be no more complaining.
{playername}, It seems our men are of better spirits. I do not need to know what you did, just know that I am thankful.
The men just needed something to occupy their time. I will go back to my post.
{playername}, there has been a number of deserters in our ranks. In our nation, we do not tolerate cowards. Have them taste the steel they are so afraid of, make examples of them.
I do not tolerate cowards. I will hunt them down and end them.
I cannot accept this mission.
Glad to hear it. Take some men with you, these deserters are not common bandits. I look forward to your report. They should be nearby, do not linger or else they will get away.
Hm. I'm disappointed, {playername}. I might start thinking that you are a coward too. Go back to your post. I need to go and find somebody to hunt them down for us.
I've heard from our scouts that you have defeated the party of deserters. The men will now think twice about running away from this war. Good job, {playername}. Go back to your post.

I've heard from our scouts that you have failed to defeat the party of deserters. Quite disappointing, it may even embolden other cowards to join them. Go back to your post, I'll send other men to hunt them down.

{playername}, I need a volunteer to scout the area. We're sorely lacking on information, and I simply must have a better picture of the situation before we can proceed. Do you want to accept this mission?
You've found your volunteer, sir.
I cannot accept this mission.
Good {man/lass}! {s5} and check out what's there. Make a note of anything you find and return to me as soon as possible.
Hm. I'm disappointed, {playername}. Go back to your post. I need to go and find somebody to scout for us.
I need to send a letter to {s13} who should be currently at {s4}. If you will be heading towards there, would you deliver it to him? The letter needs to be in his hands in 10 days.
Certainly, I intend to pass by {s4} and it would be no trouble.
I appreciate it, {playername}. Here's the letter, and a small sum to cover your travel expenses. Give my regards to {s13} when you see him.
Apologies, I cannot do this mission. You'd best send it with someone else.
That is too bad, {playername}. Go back to your post, then.

I have something you could help with, an issue with the lawless villain known as {s4}. He murdered one of my men and has been on the run from his judgment ever since. I can't let him get away with avoiding justice, so I've put a bounty of 300 denars on his head. Friends of the murdered man reckon that this assassin may have taken refuge with his kinsmen at {s3}. You might be able to hunt him down and give him what he deserves, and claim the bounty for yourself.
Then I will hunt him down and execute the law.
Apologies, I cannot do this mission. You'd best send it with someone else.

That's excellent, {playername}. I will be grateful to you and so will the family of the man he murdered. And of course the bounty on his head will be yours if you can get him. Well, good hunting to you.
As you wish, {playername}. Go back to your post.
Nevermind... (This is an error)
I wish to defer the appointment of a lord, until I take the counsel of my subjects.
As you wish, {sire/my lady}. You may decide this matter at a later date.
As you wish, {sire/my lady}. {reg6?I:{reg7?You:{s11}}} will be the new {reg3?lady:lord} of {s1}.
{s1} is not being managed by anyone. Whom shall I put in charge?
Please {s65}, I want to have {s1} for myself. (fiefs: {s0})
{s66}, you should have {s1} for yourself. (fiefs: {s0})
Hmmm. All right, {playername}. I value your counsel highly. {reg6?I:{reg7?You:{s11}}} will be the new {reg3?lady:lord} of {s1}.

Hello there. We are polishing off our combat skills here with a bit of sparring practice. You look like you could use a bit of training. Why don't you join us, and we can show you a few tricks. And if you need explanation of any combat concepts, just ask, and I will do my best to fill you in.
What do you want to practice?
Tell me what kind of practice you want.
I want to practice attacking.
I want to practice blocking with my weapon.
Let's do some sparring practice.
[Leave]

All right. There are four principle directions for attacking. These are overhead swing, right swing, left swing and thrust. Now, I will tell you which direction to attack from and you must try to do the correct attack. ^^(Move your mouse while you press the left mouse button to specify attack direction. For example, to execute an overhead attack, move the mouse up at the instant you press the left mouse button. The icons on your screen will help you do the correct action.)
Let's begin then. I am ready.
Actually I want to do something else.

Unlike a shield, blocking with a weapon can only stop attacks coming from one direction. For example if you block up, you'll deflect overhead attacks, but you can still be hit by side swings or thrust attacks. ^^(You must press and hold down the right mouse button to block.)

I'll now attack you with different types of strokes, and I will wait until you do the correct block before attacking. Try to do the correct block as soon as you can. ^^(This practice is easy to do with the 'automatic block direction' setting which is the default. If you go to the Options menu and change defend direction control to 'mouse movement' or 'keyboard', you'll need to manually choose block direction. This is much more challenging, but makes the game much more interesting. This practice can be very useful if you use manual blocking.)
Let's begin then. I am ready.
Actually I want to do something else.

Sparring is an excellent way to prepare for actual combat. We'll fight each other with non-lethal weapons now, until one of us falls to the ground. You can get some bruises of course, but better that than being cut down in the real thing.
Let's begin then. I am ready.
Actually I want to do something else.
Good. You were able to block my attacks successfully. You may repeat this practice and try to get faster each time, until you are confident of your defense skills. Do you want to have another go?
Well that didn't go too well, did it? (Remember, you must press and hold down the right mouse button to keep your block effective.) Do you want to try again?
Yes. Let's try again.
No, I think I am done for now.
Hey! We are doing a blocking practice, mate! You are supposed to block my attacks, not attack me back.
I am sorry. Let's try once again.
Sorry. I must leave this practice now.
All right. As you wish.
Well that didn't go too well, did it?  Don't feel bad, and try not to do same mistakes next time. Do you want to have a go again?
Yes. Let's do another round.
No. That was enough for me.
Well, all right. Talk to me again if you change your mind.
Hey, that was good sparring. You defeated me, but next time I'll be more careful. Do you want to have a go again?
Very good. You have learned how to attack from any direction you want. If you like we can try this again or move to a different exercise.

Not bad. Not bad at all! You seem to have grasped the basics of archery. Now, try to do the same thing with a crossbow. Take the crossbow and the bolts over there and shoot those three targets. The crossbow is much easier to shoot with compared with the bow, but you need to reload it after each shot.
Good. You didn't have too much difficulty using the crossbow either. Next you will learn to use throwing weapons. Pick up the javelins you see over there and try to hit those three targets.

Well, with that you have received the basic skills to use all three types of ranged weapons. The rest will come with practice. Train each and every day, and in time you will be as good as the best marksmen in whole length and breadth of jolly old England.
Now, you can go talk with the melee fighters or the horsemanship trainer if you haven't already done so. They can teach you important skills too.

Good day to you, young fellow. I spend my days teaching about ranged weapons to anyone that is willing to learn. If you need a tutor, let me know and I'll teach you how to use the bow, the crossbow and the javelin.
Yes, show me how to use ranged weapons.
No, not now.

All right. Your first training will be in archery. The bow is a difficult weapon to master. But once you are sufficiently good at it, you can shoot quickly and with great power. Go pick up the bow and arrows you see over there now and shoot those targets.
All right. I am ready.
Just a minute. I want to do something else first.
I hope you enjoyed the ride. Now we move on to something a bit more difficult. Grab the lance you see over there and ride around the course hitting each target at least once.

Good! You have been able to hit all targets on horseback. That's no easy feat for a starter. Your next challenge will be using a bow and arrows to shoot at the archery targets by the road. You need to put an arrow to each target to consider yourself successful.
Very good. You were able to shoot all targets from horseback. Keep riding and practising each day and in time you will be an expert horseman.
Now, you can go talk with the melee fighters or the archery trainer if you haven't already done so. You need to learn everything you can to be prepared when you have to defend yourself.

Good day! I have come here for some riding practice, but my old bones are aching badly so I decided to give myself a rest today. If you would like to practice your horsemanship, you can take my horse here. The exercise would be good for her.
Yes, I would like to practice riding.
Uhm. Maybe later.

Good. Now, I will give you a few exercises that'll teach you riding and horseback weapon use. Your first assignment is simple. Just take your horse for a ride around the course. Go as slow or as fast as you like. Come back when you feel confident as a rider and I'll give you some tougher exercises.
All right. I am ready.
Just a minute. I need to do something else first.
Hey, I am trying to practice here. Go, talk with the archery trainer if you need guidance about ranged weapons.
Is there a change of plans?
What's going on?
What are you looking at?
Are you looking at me?
Such a waste...
Better him than me
I'm not sure... Some sort of animal, clearly
Excuse me -- please accept my apologies
I'll wipe that smirk right off your face!
Do you have any idea who I am?
Do I care?
Emmm... Actually... Yes, yes, I do know who you are, {sir/madame}. Please forgive me, your grace -- it must be the drink. I'll be leaving, now...
Why, if you want a fight, you shall have one!
I thought as much. Now, remove yourself from here
You look like a {fellow/lady} who can take a few hard knocks -- and deal them out, too. I have a business proposition for you.
How's that?
Good -- I'm glad you're interested. Here's the plan... It's a little complicated, so listen well.

You and this other fellow will start up a fight here. No weapons, no armor -- I'll sit back and take bets, and split the profits with the winner. If we make a loss, then I'll cover it. You've got nothing to lose -- except a bit of blood, of course.

However, we can't organize this like one of those nice arena bouts, where everyone places their bets beforehand. People will walk in, drawn by the noise, and put a denar or two on whichever one of your two they think is winning. I'll give 'em even odds -- anything else is going to be too tricky for someone who's already on his third flagon of ale.

So, as you can see, the trick is to stretch things out for as long as possible where it looks like you're losing, and people bet against you -- and then come back fast, and win, before the betting can turn. The best way to make money is for you to be battered almost to the floor, and then jump back off your feet and take the other guy down. However, you have to win in the end in order for me, and you, to make money.
Also, you can't stretch the fight out too long, or people will suspect a fix. So, one of you has to take a punch every so often. I don't care whose blood is spilled, but there has to be some blood.
And one other thing -- my mate, your opponent, he doesn't take to well to complexity. So he's just going to come straight at you. It's up to you to supply the artistry.
So, what do you think?
I have better things to do
Good day to you, {young man/lassie}.
Forgive me, you look like a trader, but I see none of your merchandise.
Never mind.
A trader? Oh, aye, I certainly am that. My merchandise is a bit different from most, however. It has to be fed and watered twice a day and tries to run away if I turn my back.
Livestock?
Close enough. I like to call myself the man who keeps every boat on this ocean moving. Boats are driven by oars, you see, and oars need men to pull them or they stop. That's where I come in.
Galley slaves.
Now you're catching on! A trading port like this couldn't survive without them. The ships lose a few hands on every voyage, so there's always a high demand. The captains come to me and they pay well.
Where do the slaves come from?

Mostly I deal in convicted criminals bought from the authorities. Others are prisoners of war from various nations, brought to me because I offer the best prices. However, on occasion I'll buy from privateers and other . . . 'individuals'. You can't be picky about your suppliers in this line of work. You wouldn't happen to have any prisoners with you, would you?
Me?

Why not? If you intend to set foot outside this town, you're going to cross swords with someone sooner or later. And, God willing, you'll come out on top. Why not make some extra money off the whole thing? Take them alive, bring them back to me, and I'll pay you fifty crowns for each head. Don't much care who they are or where they come from.
Hmm. I'll think about it.
Do think about it! There's a lot of silver to be made, no mistake. More than enough for the both of us.
Hello, {playername}.
Anything else?
I've brought you some prisoners, Ramun. Would you like a look?
Let me see what you have...
A pleasure doing business with you.
How do I take somebody as prisoner?
Can you tell me again about capturing prisoners?

You're new to this, aren't you? Let me explain it in simple terms. The basic rule of taking someone prisoner is knocking him down with a blunt weapon, like a mace or a club, rather than cutting him open with a sword. That way he goes to sleep for a little while rather than bleeding to death, you see? I'm assuming you have a blunt weapon with you . . .
Of course.
As a matter of fact, I don't.

Good. Then all you need to do is beat the bugger down with your weapon, and when the fighting is over you clap him in irons. It's a bit different for nobles and such, they tend to be protected enough that it won't matter what kind of weapon you use, but your average rabble-rouser will bleed like a stuck pig if you get him with something sharp. I don't have many requirements in my merchandise, but I do insist they be breathing when I buy them.

No? Heh, well, this must be your lucky day. I've got an old club lying around that I was going to throw away. It a bit battered, but still good enough bash someone until he stops moving. Here, have it.
Thanks, Ramun. Perhaps I may try my hand at it.

Alright, I'll try and explain it again in simple terms. The basic rule of taking someone prisoner is knocking him down with a blunt weapon, like a mace or a club, rather than cutting him open with a sword. That way he goes to sleep for a little while rather than bleeding to death, you see? It's a bit different for nobles and such, they tend to be protected enough that it won't matter what kind of weapon you use, but your average rabble-rouser will bleed like a stuck pig if you get him with something sharp.
Alright, I think I understand. Anything else?

Well, it's not as simple as all that. Blunt weapons don't do as much damage as sharp ones, so they won't bring your enemies down as quickly. And trust me, given the chance, most of the scum you run across would just as soon kill you as look at you, so don't expect any courtesy when you pull out a club instead of a sword. Moreover, having to drag prisoners to and fro will slow down your party, which is why some people simply set their prisoners free after the fighting is done. It's madness. How could anyone turn down all that silver, eh?
Is that everything?

Just one final thing. Managing prisoners safely is not an easy thing to do, you could call it a skill in itself. If you want to capture a lot of prisoners, you should try and learn the tricks of it yourself, or you won't be able to hang on to a single man you catch.
Thanks, I'll keep it in mind.
I'd better be going.
Remember, any prisoners you've got, bring them to me. I'll pay you good silver for every one.
I humbly request that your lordship keeps his hands where I can see them.
Hey, you there! You seen any outlaws around here?
Yes, they went this way about an hour ago.
I knew it! Come on, lads, lets go get these bastards! Thanks a lot, friend.
No, haven't seen any outlaws lately.
Bah. They're holed up in this country like rats, but we'll smoke them out yet. Sooner or later.
I'm not afraid of you lot. Fight me if you dare!
You'll have nothing of mine but cold steel, scum.
My {lord/lady}, we're only poor farmers from the village of {s11}. {reg1?We are taking our products to the market at {s12}.:We are returning from the market at {s12} back to our village.}
I am hunting a group of bandits with the following description... Have you seen them?
We'll see how poor you are after I take what you've got!
Carry on, then. Farewell.
Greetings, what can we do for you?
Greetings, the master of the company commands you to follow me for an important mission.
I want to recruit you.
Nothing, I just wanted to say hello.
I hope he doesn't send us to death... forward!

We recruit? Well, we have already a contract and we must honor it, our reputation is at stake. But if you want Freelancers, recruit them directly from taverns. If they are there, this means they have no contract and are willing to follow you.
I understand, farewell.
Greetings comrade, do you need help?
Do you have any food?
Do you have any weapons or ammunition?
Greetings, the Rebel Chief of Montpellier asks you to follow me on a mission.
Join my company, you will be more useful to the cause!
No, I do not need anything. Good travels to you!
Another thing mate?
On the way...
Well, truth be told we were going to ask you the same thing...
We just intercepted a Burgundian arms shipment. These idiots got their carriage stuck in a crevasse. We were lucky. What do you need?
I need some arrows.
I have no bolts for my crossbow.
I need a sword and shield.
Give me a two-handed sword.
No, actually I do not need any of that.
There...
I hope that your last bolts are left on the body of a Burgundian that doesn't fall into a ravine where you can't get them. Here is a full quiver.
You're lucky, the convoy was carrying beautiful weapons. This is what you asked.
A simple but effective weapon, that's all we could recover.
What do you want?
Join the ranks, and I'll take you to victory over Paris.
We follow you, we have no other choice anyway.
Nothing, you can leave.
You are finally here, besiege Paris!
Yes, join the ranks and I'll take you to victory.
May God have mercy on the vanquished.
Unfortunately things have changed. Siege is out of question.
Tell me this is not true... Lord, we can not even go back to Paris, it remains for us to roam in the forest. Go to hell with your ideas.
I am at your service, {sire/my lady}
It has been an honor to serve you, {sire/my lady}
Yes, {playername}? What can I do for you?
Anything else?
I want to review the castle garrison.
Of course. Here are our lists, let me know of any changes you require...
Let me see your equipment.
Very well, it's all here...
I want you to abandon the castle and join my party.
I've grown quite fond of the place... But if it is your wish, {playername}, I'll come with you.
And where would we sleep? You're dragging a whole army with you, {playername}, there's no more room for all of us.
[Leave]
Do you want me to rejoin you?
Do you want me to rejoin you?
Are we home yet?
Not yet.
I can't wait to get back. I've missed my family so much, I'd give anything to see them again.
{playername}, when do you think we can reach our destination?
We still have a long way ahead of us.
Very soon. We're almost there.

Ah, I am going to enjoy the road for a while longer then. I won't complain. I find riding out in the open so much more pleasant than sitting in the castle all day. You know, I envy you. You can live like this all the time.
That's good news. Not that I don't like your company, but I did miss my little luxuries. Still I am sorry that I'll leave you soon. You must promise me, you'll come visit me when you can.
Greetings, {playername}, my first and foremost vassal. I await your counsel.
Anything else?
What do you think about our progress so far?

{reg11?We have {reg11} lords on our side:We have no lord with us yet}, whereas {reg21?{s9} still has {reg21} lords supporting him:{s9} has no loyal lords left}. {reg19?We control {reg13?{reg13} towns:} {reg14?{reg14} castles:} {reg15?and {reg15} villages:}:We don't control any settlements}, while {reg29?they have {reg23?{reg23} towns:} {reg24?{reg24} castles:} {reg25?and {reg25} villages:}:they have no remaining settlements}. Overall, {s30}.
Then, we must keep fighting and rally our supporters!
It seems this rebellion is not going anywhere. We must give up.
{playername}, you can't abandon me now. Are you serious?
Indeed, I am. I can't support you any longer.
I was jesting. I will fight for you until we succeed.
Are you absolutely sure? I will never forgive you if you abandon my cause.
I am sure.
Let me think about this some more.
So be it. Then my cause is lost. There is only one thing to do for me now. I will go from France and never come back. With me gone, you may try to make your peace with {s4}.
{reg65?My lady:My lord}, would you allow me to check out your equipment?
Very well, it's all here...
If it would please you, can you tell me about your skills?
Well, all right.
I suggest that you decide who should hold a fief that does not have a lord.
Which fief did you have in mind?
And who should receive it?
Never mind.
Let us keep going, {reg65?my lady:sir}.
Anything else?
Anything else?
Yes, {s5}?
As marshal, I wish you to send a message to the vassals of the realm.
Can you heal this wound to my head?
I have an arm injury, can you do something?
I have a leg injury, can you do something?
Lord! How do you manage to still be alive? We must close this horrible wound before it gets infected. It will cost 200 crowns.
Okay, here's the money, hurry, the pain is unbearable.
I do not have the amount you request.
I'm sorry, but I can not do anything in this case. I need money to pay the medicine.
Well, be careful next time, you will eventually pass away.
Indeed, your arm is a mess, 100 crowns for treatment.
Okay, here's the money, hurry, I can barely move this arm.
I do not have the amount you request.
I'm sorry, but I can not do anything in this case.
Well, be careful next time, or this arm will eventually fall.
It is not serious, however you must clean the wound and change the bandages regularly. Ointments and bandages will cost 50 crowns.
Okay, here's the money, hurry, I'm barely standing.
I do not have the amount you request.
I'm sorry, but I can not do anything in this case.
I recommend you to be more careful, no one wants a captain who can't walk.
Let me see your equipment.
Very well, it's all here...
What can you tell me about your skills?
All right, let me tell you...
We need to separate for a while.
Oh really? Well, I'm not just going to wait around here. I'm going to go to the towns to look for other work. Is that what you want?
Well, actually, there was something I needed to tell you.
That's right. We need to part ways.
No, I'd rather have you at my side.
Well. I'll be off, then. Look me up if you need me.
I'd like to ask you something.
Never mind.
Very well. What did you want to ask?
How do you feel about the way things are going in this company?
Tell me your story again.
I suppose you know that I aspire to be {king/queen} of this land?
Do you have any connections that we could use to our advantage?
Would you be interested in holding a fief?
Then shortly after, I joined up with you.
Anything else?
Um... Yes. I had heard.
Would you then support my cause?
Very good. I shall keep that in mind.

I would, {s21}. Moreover, I have a proposal on how I might help you attain your throne. But you recently sent {s22} off on a similar mission. Perhaps we should wait for a couple of weeks to avoid drawing too much attention to ourselves.
Very good. You do that
On second thought, stay with me for a while
Farewell then, {s21}, for a little while

Of course, as few people should know of this as possible. If you want to collect the information, or pull me out, then don't send a messenger. Come and get me yourself -- even if that means you have to sneak through the gates.
Splendid idea -- you do that.
Actually, hold off for now.
Good. I should be ready to report in about five days. Farewell then, {s21}, for a little while.
Sir, look at those horses...
I see merchant...
You call this a horse?
They are cheap. Sir, we will not endure famine because of the war. Do not make me eat my horses, buy them from me.
Or merchant... since you like both your horses, I would take great care.
I need a real horse for war, good luck...
Really? I'm so happy! I summoned patriarch, doves and Isabella...
Take another one, please.
I have to go away...
Traveller... a piece for a poor beggar, my wife lost her sight. As for me... no, do not worry, I don't carry plague, I assure you.
Of course, good man... my faith would not allow me to leave you like this.
Out of my sight, leper.
[Leave]
My Lord... you are so good, allow me to ask you for a mere 10 crowns. You will save a poor man on the verge of starvation.
Here, 20 crowns.
20 crowns? I can have a meal, wine and wenches. Farewell begging...
Thank you, you are so brave my Lord, I will tell everyone how generous you are.
My Lord, you see this horse? It's not a given that everyone is able to mount it.
And why not?
Good for him, good bye.
Horses like this are gifts of nature that only a true master can bring to their best. They can wear full plate armor without feeling the added weight.
Impressive
I know horses, it does not impress me.
I could teach you how to ride these beasts that are particularly difficult to master, for a certain amount of course, say 1000 crowns.
It's okay, I know what this kind of horse ride costs.
I'm afraid I do not have the means, but I would.
This is fine, start by holding up straight. How do you become one with such a noble animal, even if you have little flexibility...
Greetings, what brings you to the royal stables? Do you want a horse? Or maybe you have lost your way?
I want to see your horses indeed, they are renowned throughout France.
I just wanted a ride.
Normally they are not for sale, but the Regent needs gold, so he's willing to be separated from some of his best horses.
You need something else?
I would like to see your horses.
No, I've seen enough.
Again thank you for the service, I am soon to be knighted and I don't see myself having to fight without the sword of my house.
Glad I could help.
My Lord, do you have my sword?
Here it is, but it is in poor condition.
Yes, I do! That's it, the last time I saw her I was a child. Consider taking this 200 crowns and of course don't talk to anyone about your shipment.
This is practically the sum I had to give the guard.
I'm sorry, but I'm not very wealthy. You say that a man will die with his sword, it is very important for a Knight you know?
My Lord, do you have my sword?
No, not yet.
I no longer take care of it, find someone else.
I see out of my cowardly view.
What do you want?
Can I ask who you are? A Knight?
Nothing, I just wanted to get warm by the fire.
Squire... I'm just a squire, but I'm going to be knighted shortly. I actually have a favor to ask from you regarding that.

I will go to war soon and I long to have the sword of my ancestors. I'm sure it will bring me luck in battle. Could you bring it to me, please? I would give you 200 crowns for this service. Although you might resell it for a higher price, but I guess I'll have to trust you.
Why not ask this from someone you trust completely?

Impossible, because you see my line was broken. It's not my father who gave me my idea. My father didn't take up arms on behalf of the family, he was poor. You have to find the sword in the grave of my grandfather. Do you accept?
Granted! If you need it, and for 200 crowns.
I refuse to go into a tomb for 200 crowns, farewell.

Thank you wholeheartedly. You will find the sword in a tomb in the crypts of the catacombs here in Paris. The only problem is that entry is prohibited, so you will perhaps need to bribe the guard. In this case I will reimburse you. Bring me my sword, I feel naked without it on the battlefield, or before God.

Greetings, I am Father Jacob, I run the hospices, and as you see, the buildings are not sufficient to contain all the wounded of the war. We do not make distinction, Burgundians, English or even French, we must come in help to the dying, but what can I do for you?
I'm hurt Father, can you heal me?
I have a head wound, please do something.
My arm is wounded, can you do something?
I have a leg injury, can you do something?
Tell me about your work at the hospices.
Can you perfom a blessing over my men? They are brave soldiers, and your blessing would improve their morale, preparing them for the worst.
Do not pay attention to me, I'm just out for a walk.
Strange place for just walking around, my friend. Are you sane? One of the colleges in Metz could do something for you if need be.
Well, I don't have time to look after everyone as you can imagine, but I can make an effort if you pay me 200 crowns as compensation. It would allow me to buy food and medicine for the wounded.
Okay, hurry if possible, I have much to do.
What a bad wound, let me tend it...
I can't afford that.
Lord! Did you know that your skull is open? We must close this horrible wound before it gets infected, it will cost 200 crowns.
Okay, here's the money, hurry, the pain is unbearable.
I do not have the amount you request.
I'm sorry, but I can not do anything in this case.
Well, be careful next time, I will no longer see to such an injury.
Indeed, this is a war wound, I do not ask you which side you are, or even if you are a thief, I just ask you if you have 100 crowns to pay for the care.
Okay, here's the money, hurry, I can barely move my arm.
I do not have the amount you request.
I'm sorry, but I can not do anything in this case.
Well, be careful next time, how about buying a shield?
It's not serious, however you must clean the wound and change the bandages regularly. Ointments and bandages will cost 50 crowns.
Okay, here's the money, hurry, I'm barely standing.
I do not have the amount you request.
I'm sorry, but I can not do anything in this case.
I recommend you to be more careful, a little rest from afar fighting would make you the most good.
There is nothing to tell, I assure you. The army men brought me here. Almost all of them leave this place on a carriage. The war does a lot of damage, you know.
Is there anything else I can help you with?

Hmm, how could I refuse to bless these men? If they were to die in battle they must be ready. I could do it, but I have obligations. I might be able to free myself if compensated. A 200 denar donation should do the trick, it will allow us to order food and care for newcomers.
Naturally, my men are worth it.
I do not have that kind of money.
It is far too expensive for a single prayer. You are truly religious, or a banker?
Very well, in that case bring me to them...
In this case, I would be more useful treating my patients. I'm confused, but I have to go to where I am most useful.
Watch your words my son, everyone suffers in all camps. For my part I can not help everyone, I got this idea for a long time.
Inter oves locum præsta. Et ab hædis me sequestra, Statuens in parte dextra.
Amen. Excuse me, what can you tell me about father Jacob?
Nothing, I must go.
Father Jacob has suffered lately. He's seen patients die, one after another. Most were so mutilated that they couldn't do anything for them, but still he wanted to be able to save them...
Tell him to hold on, it will all end well.
I will, thank you for your appreciation.
They got you too?
Me?
Yes, they got me. I have to go now.
For me the fighting is over, I can barely walk. A crossbow bolt passed through my thigh, it wasn't a pretty sight. But yours look good... for now anyway.
Crossbow bolt, yikes...
Indeed.
What a beautiful day my son, is it not?
In fact my father is good.
Really?
But of course my son, all seasons are beautiful when you are in the Lord's service. Each season gives a different harvest, the rain and the sun makes them grow, gives them flavor and aromas.
But what are you doing to with the cloister my son, will you join us?
Do you want to know something else my son?
I just ask a healer, I am wounded.
I have a head injury, do something, it feels horrible.
I have an arm injury, I have great difficulty in moving it, can you do something?
I have a leg injury, can you heal it?
What do you do during your days in the cloister?
I have to go elsewhere, but I'll be back.
Well we produce strong drinks, excellent quality cheese, a little wine, and I even heal people in the city. We provide for our humble needs and collect money to help the sick and the poor.
The English will never attack?
They do not dare, at least we hope. God's wrath will come upon them.
Well, I'm not the best doctor in France, but I can cure you of a spoiled tooth or heal an injury with my plants. I ask you 100 crowns in return.
Do your best, but be quick.
I don't have enough money. I'll be back.
My God! Did you know that your skull is open? We must close this horrible wound before it gets infected, It will cost 200 crowns.
Okay, here's the money, hurry, I am somewhat disoriented.
I don't have the money on me.
I'm sorry, but I can not do anything in this case.
Well, be careful next time, you just came close to death.
Indeed, this is a terrible wound. 100 crowns to pay for care.
Okay, here's the money, quickly make the blood stop flowing.
I do not have the amount you request.
I'm sorry, but I can not do anything in this case.
Well, be careful next time, or you will lose your arm.
It is not serious, however you must clean the wound and change the bandages regularly. Ointments and bandages will cost 50 crowns.
Okay, here's the money, hurry, I'm barely standing.
I do not have the amount you request.
I'm sorry, but I can not do anything in this case.
I recommend you to be more careful, and move on horseback for a while.
Where can I find a better doctor, no offense...
Ho, no harm. The best doctor I know of is father Jacob in Dijon. This may be inside enemy territory, but if you're suffering, you don't have a choice.
Stop moving my son, you make me drop my knife every time...
Greetings my son, what are you doing here, do you want to become a monk?
I have a party of soldiers, whose morale is at its lowest. They fear for their souls, can you bless them?

Well I must not leave the cloister, but if you bring them here I can do it in my office. By the way you're in luck, our prayers are famous throughout France, thanks to the miracle that took place a long time ago near the road to the city. I ask you a sum of 400 crowns, this would greatly help our poor and our patients.
It's short, but men feel much better after that, it's okay.
I do not have that kind of money.
What more can I do in this case?
Very well, bring them to me here...
I leave you, father. I have to withdraw to allow myself time to think.
My friend, taste this grape. It's the best in all of France. Even if all the winemakers feel the same way of their own produce, in any case I am very proud.
Do you produce wine?
I have to leave, another time perhaps.
Yes, wine and strong drink of very good quality. Also very good cheese we sell in the city and to the pilgrims.
I want to buy your products.
Are there often pilgrims around here?
I'm sorry, but I have to go now.
But of course, look at this quality.
Thank you my son, do you need something else?

Every year on St. Jacques day, pilgrims from all over France start their pilgrimage towards Saint Jacques de Compostela. Many of them make a stop at our cloister. Pilgrims are recognizable from a white shell sewn on their hats. Do you want to know something else?
Traveller, welcome to our cloister where good mood reigns. What can I do for you?
Can you hear a confession, father?
I need help.
No thank you, I have to leave quickly.
I would help with great pleasure, what do you require?
I need a doctor.
Do you have food to sell?
A priest. May he come to bless my company?
Thank you.
Father Michel cares for the people of the city, please contact him if you are suffering. He does his best to help the poor. Do not contact him if you do not completely meet this criteria.
Ask father Jacques. Surely he has reservations about selling, but you will find him in the garden.
Contact father William, maybe he can help you.
My friend, you seem to be in a hurry. If I may ask, why such impatience, have you committed a crime?
Oh my god, how did you get in?
What's going on?
Goodbye.
You'd better talk to the Abbess as soon as possible.
Get out of here, I beg you ...
What, why are you still here? Have you talked to the Abbess?
Why?
I will go and talk to her.

We are contagious. A plague broke out, long ago. The inhabitants of the district are forsaken. They wanted to set fire to the Abbey to eradicate evil, but they don't dare for fear that it causes the God to get angry and expand the epidemic.
But what do you live on?
I have to leave before it's too late, good luck.
Pray for us, my friend.

Villagers bring us a daily food basket. A long time ago someone had slipped a letter inside the shopping basket. The letter said that if we didn't take the cart before nightfall it's because we're all dead, and that they would set fire to the district if that happened. For all this time we've continued to pick it up and survived, but many of our sisters have died.
But all this time? you are all alive, the epidemic may have passed?
I won't stay a moment longer, farewell.
You're saying the epidemic is over? It's strange, but we haven't considered that. But how to be sure? If we go out we may end up causing the death of all of the villagers. We can't take that risk.
You're back? What can we do for our friend who is not afraid of us?
I doubt you have your problems, but I am hurt, can you heal me?
I have a head injury, do something please.
I have an arm injury, can you do something?
I have a leg injury, can you do something?
I wanted to just say hello, I have to go now.
Of course my friend, what terrible injuries...
Lord! Did you know that your skull is open? We must close this horrible wound before it gets infected. It will cost you 100 crowns.
Okay, here's the money, hurry, the pain is unbearable.
I do not have the amount you request.
I'm sorry, but I can't do anything in this case. I can't replace these drugs if I have no money and we are so sick here.
Well, be careful next time, I will no longer see to such an injury.
Indeed, this is a war wound. I don't ask you which side you are, or even if you are a thief. I just ask you if you have 50 crowns to pay for care.
Okay, here's the money, hurry, I can barely move my arm.
I do not have the amount you request.
I'm sorry, but I can't do anything in this case. I can't replace these drugs if I have no money and we are so sick here.
Well, be careful next time, how about buying a shield?
It isn't serious, however you must clean the wound and change the bandages regularly. Ointments and bandages will cost 10 crowns.
Okay, here's the money, hurry, I'm barely standing,
I do not have the amount you request.
I'm sorry, but I can't do anything in this case. I can't replace these drugs if I have no money and we are so sick here.
I recommend you to be more careful, a little rest far from fighting would make you the most good.
Who are you? What are you doing here?
I am {playername}. What torments you, my dear Abbess?
I know that you have your own problems, but I'm injured. Can you heal me?
Everything smells rotten, I'd better leave.

The Plague has struck here, in this city. It started to spread within our walls, only God knows how, and we live here in reclusion. But how the hell did you get in, the passage to the cloister is supposed to be blocked? You must leave as soon as possible or your life will be forfeit.
I could work my way in easily.
I am going.
Forgive us, but you have to leave, flee this place.
But... you don't fear the plague?
I am sure you won't take any chances.
This is a bad idea. In fact, I think I should go.
Well, as you wish. I understand that you don't have a choice. I can heal you, but on one condition. We need bread, give us bread and I will check your condition.
Here's your bread, fix me up please.
I don't have it, but I'll come back with your bread soon.
I have never seen such injuries...
The tavern is still open, go back later.
Are you the landlord?
Thank you for the information.
No, I am a carpenter.
If the tavern is closed, what did you make before?
Farewell, I must go.
This question, I expect it opens...
I wish you success in such an undertaking.
That's it.
Beautiful piece is it not?
Very nice, and very dangerous I guess.
Not bad, but I have to go.

It's especially effective to down a wall that sappers have previously weakened by digging a tunnel under the foundation. They set it on fire and when the first stone hits the wall it collapses on those who were protected behind.
You seem to know siege weapons, can you give me some guidance?
Very interesting, but I have to go.
I am only tailpiece, contact the teacher for details.
What can I do for you? If this is for an order I only work for the lords with whom I have an agreement.
I just want to learn how to use siege weapons more effectively.
Do you have any out of the ordinary weapons?
Well... I think I can trust you, but it will take the full price. They are dangerous and powerful new weapons, you see?

Thank you very much, I'd only hope that these devastating weapons will be in good hands. You see they are effective at a distance. You should try them out on a target for you to realize... do you want something else?
I would not bother, I'm going.
Well I can teach you the details, for 1000 crowns. What do you say?
Okay, here is the gold...
I don't have 1000 crowns, I'll definitely return.
Perfect, let's start from the beginning. For you what is the best way to cross a wall?
What is there, Messire?
I'm looking for the tavern.
I do not want to disturb, I'm leaving.
You are not there at all, you are still very afar. Return to the entrance and up the stairs, turn right, and that's all down before the wash, do not forget to drink a drink for me when you get there.
Thank you my good man.
I do not particularly like to train, but it is essential.
Training is essential for any fighter who wishes to live for some time.
Good luck.
I know that sometimes I understand thieves. No need to escape to the task, they take to others!
The fate that is reserved for thieves is not enviable in training a guard.
Apologies Sir, but if you want to buy weapons, they are not for sale.
These are good blades at first glance.
I'm just passing.
These are very good swords, you can believe it. They are forged at the street just behind, but they are reserved for safekeeping.
Too bad, farewell.
So, not too bad? Would you like some more?
Yes, what does not kill you, makes you stronger.
I believe I'll be fine
I wish you good luck.
Can you teach me how to improve my mastery of two-handed weapons?
Lets fight!
Thank you, but I have to leave now.
Well, if some sprains do not scare you, I am yours.
Hmm... of course if you have what it takes to succeed and if you have gold. 3000 crowns will do the trick.
What can you tell me of the price?
How much? No, I refuse.

Perhaps you have always desired to use a two-handed weapon on the battlefield, but you said that you wouldn't have an advantage because these weapons are too heavy. I suggest this competition to prove you wrong and offer to teach you what it takes for you to be feared throughout the country.
It's okay, I like that.
I can not pay such a sum.
Okay, start thinking about something that gets you angry.
Such as the fact of having lost 3000 crowns?
That's it! You have beaten me! ... again, sir, I can not remain defeated before my men.
Yes, I'll give you a chance to take your revenge.
I will leave you... to recover.
This time you will not have a chance.
Can you teach me how to improve my mastery of two-handed weapons ?
Lets fight!
Thank you, but I have to leave now.
Well, if some sprains do not scare you, I am yours.
Hmm... of course, if you have what it takes to succeed and if you have gold. 3000 crowns will do the trick.
What can you tell me of the price?
How much? No, I refuse.

Perhaps you have always desired to use a two-handed weapon on the battlefield, but you said that you wouldn't have an advantage because these weapons are too heavy. I suggest this competition to prove you wrong and offer to teach you what it takes for you to be feared throughout the country.
It's okay, I like that.
I can not pay such a sum.
Okay, start thinking about something that gets you angry.
Such as the fact of having lost 3000 crowns?
What can I do for you, Sir? If it is to complain of the noise of men, know that I am not their mother, I only teach them to hold a sword.
No, I was wondering if you could train me too.
I have to leave.
It depends ... if you have the right skills, I can help you perfect them, but I'm not here to show you how to pull a sword out of its sheathe.
Can you teach me how to improve my mastery of two-handed weapons ?
Let's fight!
Thank you, but I have to leave now.
Well, if some sprains do not scare you, I am yours.
Hmm... of course, if you have what it takes to succeed and if you have gold. 3000 crowns will do the trick.
What can you tell me about the price?
How much? No, I refuse.

Perhaps you have always desired to use a two-handed weapon on the battlefield, but you said that you wouldn't have an advantage because these weapons are too heavy. I suggest this competition to prove you wrong and offer to teach you what it takes for you to be feared throughout the country.
It's okay, I like that.
I can not pay such a sum.
Okay, start thinking about something that gets you angry.
Such as the fact of having lost 3000 crowns?
Attention, back off or risk getting your throat slit.
Pay a little attention.
Back, My lord.
Pay a little attention.
So it is too fast?
I'll get there, I know it.
I think ... it will go
I wish you good luck.
Can you teach me how to improve my mastery of one-handed swords and shields at the same time?
En garde!
Thank you, but I have to leave now.
That's it ...
Want to know how Border Guards of Lyon are able to be untouchable and to respond as fast, huh? Well I can teach you some moves for 3000 crowns, okay?
What can you tell me about the price?
How much? No, I refuse.

Well, some will tell you that the best weapon is the spear or the hammer, or a covered jug of dung. Send them to hell. The only valid war weapons are a sword and a shield. I can teach you to handle both at the same time effectively. All that remains is to cut armor and beggars that are there. For balance the hammer or the Bec de Corbin are not bad.
It's okay, I want to be quick!
I can not pay such a sum.
Okay, you have to start to realize that you have two arms. One defends another attacks... and you only have to think about defense when you attack, while thinking of the attack when you defend.
I think I got the trick.
Fuck, fucking beggar. How did you succeed? If it was on the battlefield I'd be dead, yet... do not stay on a defeat.
Yes, I will allow you your chance at revenge.
I can not waste any more time ... sorry about your own love.
This time, you will not see anything coming.
Can you teach me how to improve my mastery of one-handed swords and shields at the same time?
En garde!
Sorry, but I have to leave now.
Warning to the beggars!
Want to know how Border Guards of Lyon are able to be untouchable and to respond as fast, huh? Well I can teach you some moves for 3000 crowns, okay?
What can you tell me about the price?
How much? No, I refuse.

Well, some will tell you that the best weapon is the spear or the hammer, or a covered jug of dung. Send them to hell. The only valid war weapons are a sword and a shield. I can teach you to handle both at the same time effectively. All that remains is to cut armor and beggars that are there. For balance the hammer or the Bec de Corbin are not bad.
It's okay, I like it.
I can not pay such a sum.
Okay, you have to start to realize that you have two arms. One defends another attacks... and you only have to think about defense when you attack, while thinking of the attack when you defend.
I think I got the trick.
Greetings, what are you doing in the barracks? The tavern is not on this side, you know.
I was wondering if you could to train me with the sword and shield.
I take the road to the tavern in this case, farewell.
Well ... why not, what technique are you lacking now?
Can you teach me how to improve my mastery of one-handed swords and shields at the same time?
Let's fight!
Thank you, but I have to leave now.
If you want to take shots I know how to stop you... well, try to follow me.
Want to know how Border Guards of Lyon are able to be untouchable and to respond as fast, huh? Well I can teach you some moves for 3000 crowns, okay?
What can you tell me about the price?
The price of a king's ransom? Farewell, it is not ok.

Well, some will tell you that the best weapon is the spear or the hammer, or a covered jug of dung. Send them to hell. The only valid war weapons are a sword and a shield. I can teach you to handle both at the same time effectively. All that remains is to cut armor and beggars that are there. For balance the hammer or the Bec de Corbin are not bad.
That's okay, could you be about?
I can not pay such a sum.
Okay, you have to start to realize that you have two arms. One defends another attacks... and you only have to think about defense when you attack, while thinking of the attack when you defend.
I think I got the trick...
Watch Out! What are you doing in our legs?
My apologies.
Back
Pay a little attention.
Do not approach a man who stands guard without making noises, please.
My apologies.
Sir? Is it a visit, or do you have a message for the captain?
Rather, it is a visit to this case, but I will not stay long.
What are you doing here? It's a fire you know? While this may look like a tavern.
Well, I'm going.
Greetings, if you are here for an order, please talk to the master.
What do you think of the master?
I'm leaving immediately.
Master is not a bad guy. He certainly doesn't miss an opportunity to snub me in public, but it's to remind everyone who is the master blacksmith and who is the apprentice.
Welcome to my humble abode, what can I do for you?
Such modesty, there seems to everything you'd need to equip an army.
Master, I want to see your works.
I have to go but I'll be back.
I pay particular attention to the quality. My blades are forged from the purest steel. It takes a steady hand and the knowledge of a master blacksmith to get such results.
Anything else?
Admire this quality, my lord.

Approach, My lord. Do you wish to buy a new banner? A moment, forgive me, but is there a possibility that you aren't a noble after all? In any case have a look, but know that I refuse to make a noble banner for someone who is not one, you probably know that it's forbidden. I wouldn't put myself up for public shaming.
Of course I am noble. Show me your banners, artisan.
And if I was not noble and I wanted a banner anyway, just to impress my troupe of mercenaries, what would happen?
Do not worry, it doesn't interest me anyway.
It's perfect, My Lord. Let me show you my creations. It will cost 150 crowns and you can be sure of the quality.
Oh my god, I would risk not having the right to exercise my profession if it was ever known. I refuse. Go now or I will call the guards.
Here's the gold, show me the banners now.
I do not have 150 crowns to spend on a damn banner.
You will not be disappointed, I guarantee you.
My Lord, here... do you want a fresh, good ale? Or do you want to try my wine? I can get plenty more if you wish so.
Great idea, let me see.
I have enough already, but thank you.
But of course, go ahead.
Thank you my friend, do you need something else?
Want to buy my books?
No, I bring you cargo from the Guild of Messengers.
Very well, is this it?
Here it is.
Well, I lost it.
How?! How could you misplace such a big box? Get lost.
Want to buy my books?
No, I bring you cargo from the Guild of Messengers.
Thank you my friend, do you need something else?
Here it is.
Well, I lost it.
How?! How could you misplace such a big box? Get lost.
Want to buy my books?
No, I bring you cargo from the Guild of Messengers.
Thank you my friend, do you need something else?
Here it is.
Well, I lost it.
How?! How could you misplace such a big box? Get lost.
Want to buy my books?
No, I bring you cargo from the Guild of Messengers.
Thank you my friend, do you need something else?
Here it is.
Well, I lost it.
How?! How could you misplace such a big box? Get lost.
Hello, is that you?
The Archangel Gabriel is hungry.
I would like a book
I am better at doing than reading.
Very good. Buy it and leave, please.
Now go, I risk my life.
Very funny, really. Listen, the rebels have made me a favor and now we're even. Buy my book or disappear... look out, talk something else quickly.
Ha... finally someone who can read. Want to buy one of my books? I have a fabulous collection and unbeatable prices.
They told me to tell you that the Archangel Gabriel is hungry.
Let me see, I might be interested.
I am better at doing than reading.
Do you see yourself?
Thanks, will you take another?
Well... I expected you, look, we're even now.
Come closer! Pottery, bowls, soup bowls, glasses...
What would I do with your pottery?
No, thank you.
I don't know. If it wasn't for a household, you could always sell the most expensive ones elsewhere if you travel a lot.
This is perhaps a good idea, if the price is right. Show me your wares.
I have better things to do than to burden me with all this muck.
You make an excellent point, My Lord. You see, the artisans are still cheaper than wholesalers.
Thank you very much, do you want more?
Ready to depart?
Yes, let's go quickly.
Not yet.
We are leaving soon, so go talk to the passengers.
Very well.
We are leaving soon, so go talk to the passengers.
Very well.
Welcome traveller, find your place among all this mess if you want to get to Dijon. It'll cost 50 crowns.
Okay, here's the money ...
Merde! I don't have enough.
No money, no trip. My condolences, find a solution or you stay here.
It's perfect, we set off right now, are you ready?
We leave soon, stay around...
Do not stay in my way, we're not ready, go to the bridge ...
Yes, let's go quickly.
Not yet, I have something to do.
Greetings... just taking a small break. Getting right back to work, I promise!
Easy, I'm not your landlord.
Do you have something to eat?
I have to go.
Of course, I make bread and cheese. Take your pick.
Thank you and my apologies, but I've got work to do.
Approach, traveller. I sell weapons, do you see my coffers? I have some quality pieces.
I knew it as soon as I saw a man doubling as a weapons rack.
Moment, I need to check my purse.
Sure... you know, these days it's foolish to travel unarmed. I reckon the longer the blade, the more it will impress all sorts of brigands.
Thank you, I hope the journey won't be too long.
Fresh horses for your travel to Dijon.
These horses look nice.
My purse is empty, I have to think twice before buying anything.
See for yourself, my lord, they come ready and willing.
At your service.
A long journey awaits us, I'll get some sleep and hope that you won't betray us.
You can rest easy.
Hey! Comrade, come closer.
Another thief, what would you say to a swim to the river bottom?
You misunderstand me, friend. My name is Michel and I'm just a traveller like you walking towards his destiny, are you French? You're ... a merchant?
Are you Burgundian?

Ha ha... I like you, traveller. Are you aware of the situation in France, or have you been cut out from the rest of the world in your little village? Let me tell you this: You think you're safe from war in the hinterlands, but one day the English will come and set your house on fire. They will kill anyone who resists and violate their women, then they drink and do it again. Frenchman taking a boat to Burgundy should know what to expect out there.
War?
War? Yes, she has a hundred faces; that of a crying child, that of a man begging his torturer and that of a man who has no face, mutilated deep in his flesh.

The worst in all this is that those who hold the spear, the nobles, they have no share in this suffering. They stuff themselves playing a war, always sending the poor devils to be massacred, and if they don't agree they are killed on the spot.
If your goal was to spoil my trip, you succeeded.

You think you are ready for combat, but believe me you're not. There is hope, have you heard about Joan of Lorraine? Says she was sent by God to save us. The people rebelled and gathered under her orders near occupied cities and began to organize. I am part of a gathering of fellows. You seem trustworthy so I'll tell you that we are gathering in the ruins of the Tower of the Pines in Montpellier. Join us! This is your only chance of salvation. We need each other, believe me, and if you don't have faith - no fear, you will be paid for your help. So, are you going to go to Montpellier, comrade?
Very well, I'll go and see your friends when I get near Montpellier.
Not interested, sorry.
That's good to hear. You'll see, and thrive among us, comrade...
Welcome aboard. Do not forget to pay. The captain has already thrown travellers overboard because they didn't. I assure you, I saw with my own eyes.
Where can I find the captain?
Thank you for your guidance, friend. Farewell.
On the upper deck. I suggest caution, he's angry.
Why are you going to Dijon, if I can ask you this question?
I am a man of arms, and I will join the fights further north, that's where I belong.
I need to go to Dijon, I have to visit a dying aunt.
You can not.
I hope that the trip will go well, I heard rumors that the river is infested with pirates.
Finally I can get some sleep before the next battle.
Best idea of the day.
Hello adventurer, are you a mercenary?
Indeed, I am a mercenary.
Not really, I'm on a different path.
I thought so. What company do you belong to?

Well, if you are ever short of crowns, know that the company of Freelancers recruits in the city of Bourges. Barracks is at the Gordaine Square. Their admission tests are very hard, but they pay like lords.
Thank you, I'll remember.
I'm not in a company currently.

I am in a great company, they are fighting at the moment and are recruiting. You should go to Bourges and pass the admission test. Beware, they are demanding, but the pay is good. If you want to try your luck their barracks is on Gordaine square.
Okay, I will pass their test, thank you.
Thanks, but I don't want to get in a company.
Good luck friend.

Approach, My lord. Do you wish to buy a new banner? A moment, forgive me, but is there a possibility that you aren't a noble after all? In any case have a look, but know that I refuse to make a noble banner for someone who is not one, you probably know that it's forbidden. I wouldn't put myself up for public shaming.
Of course I am noble. Show me your banners, artisan.
If I wasn't and I wanted a banner to just impress my squad of mercenaries, what would you do?
Do not worry, it doesn't interest me anyway.
It's perfect, My Lord. Let me show you my creations. It will cost 150 crowns and you can be sure of the quality.
Dear God, I'd lose the right to exercise my profession if it ever came known. If you refuse to leave, I'll call the guard.
Here's the gold, show me banners now.
Here's 150 crowns, show me the banners.
You will not be disappointed, I guarantee you.
Hey! What are you doing here? Go away.
Who lives in this castle?
I have an invitation to the banquet with me, I want to enter.
Do not mind, I'm just passing through.
If you don't know, you have no business being here. Disappear, dirty thief!
Show me... everything is in order, My Lord. You can enter.
My lord
At ease.
Have a good time.
Pretty armor.
But... who're you?
Don't you hear the voices of the innocent that you massacred? I am their avenging arm.
I won't make excuses, dear Count. Urgent business, remember?
Lord no! A rebel... rebel!!
Greetings, My lord.
Thank you.
My respects, My lord.
Well, don't take this the wrong way My Lord, but... I suggest exercising caution with your new weapon.
No fear.
My lord? What... what can I do for you in our humble barracks?
Where is the count?
I fear of a rebel attack, could you give me a weapon? I would feel much better.
Nothing, I am completely lost.
But certainly, My Lord. What would you like? A dagger perhaps?
I know nothing about weapons. I'm more used to holding a pen, but a crossbow or a sword should be enough to reassure me.
An excellent choice. My Lord... and you say that you've never seen a gun? You are surely gifted in all disciplines. The best place to hold is here.
The Count is in his apartments at the top of the castle. I have not seen him down and that's the only way, do you want something else?
My Lord, a little fresh air won't hurt, am I right?
Do you fear an attack by the rebels?
No, not at all. Believe in my experience, they won't come into the city to attack us with wooden forks, ha ha... over here we have very good soldiers.
If they are all as quick-witted as you, I'm reassured.
My respects, Mister.
My respects, Mister.
Thank you... well, I mean... nothing.
My respects, My lord.
My respects, My lord.
Sincerely, dear friend. Are you related to the Count?
Well... no, I must leave you.
So... the bastard died?
We can't have more death, leave quickly.
Shit, how do we proceed?
So... the bastard died?
I can't go back, the mission... is a failure.
Shit, how do we proceed?
These banquets are so boring, we only drink, eat and drink again...
I admit to having very little chance to get bored.
What do you mean? A trait of mind that I do not understand, it's too bad, it could've brightened up this evening...
France will soon belong to England.
News from the front?
This peasant witch continues to provoke revolt. This is unacceptable. We should summon an assassin no matter the cost.
Are you here for trading or something else?
...and you, I figure from your looks that you are the most skilful merchant of us all. Do you have many goods?
Oh, oh... you guessed right, My Lord. I have many stables, we also manufacture boats. This evening seems good advertisement.
Couldn't be.
How is the wine, sir?
Hen, come back.
Sir, I'm afraid we've seen the end of chivalry. Earlier we were fighting on equal terms to serve our good law. How will this war end, I ask you?
Sometimes it's offered by a real gentleman knight, whatever his side.
Ha! ... and that gentleman knight, you've encountered one?
Surely...
You can pass.
You're doing a great job, friend.
That's about it, laugh at me!
I do not trust you, in spite of everything, so keep your hands away from your weapons.
I'll remember.
Stop! Who are you and what are you doing here?
Michel sent me here to meet your leader.
Ah! Very good, you can go comrade.
I'm tired of all this.
You only have to do that, it's simple.
Leave my companions? Where are do you taking me?
So we came to get bogged down in the marshes?
How are things here?
Bad, very bad. We are starving. There is game around here, but not much else. I do not fear the English, because it's the hunger that will defeat us.
A little rest won't hurt.
Of what use am I to you at this point?
...and who cuts the wood after you, huh?
Hello friend, what's your name?
I'm {playername}.
Welcome {playername}, find yourself a nice and dry place and do not worry, you won't be bothered. There are no bad guys here.
I need to drink, this rain makes me thirsty.
You only have to drink water from the marshes.
How are you?
A little wet... where is your leader?
You mean our chief? He's at the top of the tower as always. I hope he's looking for a way to get us something to eat.
Hello there.
Where's the chief?
At the top of the tower.
Greetings
Greetings, still drafty?
Yes, but you who stay down you risk a lot more than me. You know it's strange but it's been a while since I came down from this tower.
Greetings
Greetings, I heard you give out bounties to mercenaries, that's about it.
Soon... Ha, ha, ha, ha!
Thank you for everything, comrade.
It was easy.
Nice to see a new face. Please, speak to the chief.
Very well.
{playername}, it's always a pleasure to see you. How are you?
I can get ... and you?
Its ok as it is, even if it's not always easy.
Back? How was Burgundy?
I went to Toul, but the rebels are gone. I found this note, but it seems coded.
Let me see...

Yes, that's about it. It's a fairly simple but indecipherable code in the case we need to leave directions on the ground. The Burgundian rebels say they have to move. They are hiding in the Verzy forest, near Reims. You know what remains to be done.
Why the change of place and why make me go all this way?
No idea, you ask them. Good luck.
Back? How was Burgundy?
I didn't find rebels at Toul, they have left the area.
Well, the forests are the best places to stay concealed while being close enough to the enemy. You should look in the forests near the Burgundian cities, Reims and Metz seem to be perfect places.
Good to see you mate! You seem fine, how was Toul?
I haven't left yet, other urgent matters hold me.
Do your best and you'll always be welcome at camp.

This is great, comrade. We finally found our way. After all these years going in circles at the camps, being chased by the English patrols. We now know what to do. Attacking convoys and camps help to thwart the general Anglo-Burgundian strategy to settle in the south. You've been great but you're of no further use to us here, we will work this out. The rebels who operate in Burgundy are currently having more problems than we and they need men. I sent some guys there. You should join them. They settled in the deserted village of Toul, south of Metz.

This village was decimated by the plague, but don't worry. There's no risk, it's long gone. Find them and ask them what they need, if you still want to serve the cause. Some say that the village is haunted, which makes it perfect for hiding... I hope that you are a good addition.
Okay, I oppose the English, so I'll go to the village of Toul.
I can't tell whether your cause is the path I want to follow.
I don't know what to give you for your help as I possess nothing, but I'll gladly offer my horse. It's a very good horse. May God protect you.
So have you razed the camp?
This is done, they are no more.

I'm struggling to believe it. Finally we have achieved something! We must continue our action, comrade. Do not release the pressure and stay strong in difficult times. Now I need time to think, and... thank you again.
So have you razed the camp?
No, we have been defeated, I am sorry.
Damn, just when you start to get by. It's not your fault, I am sure you have done your best, maybe they are too strong at the moment. Leave me alone I have to think this over, comrade.
So have you razed the camp?
Not yet, but we will take care of it.
I'm sorry, comrade. I can't take care of that.

I can't force you, right? But think about the fact that if we do not act, the Englishmen will be at our doors soon, and it will dictate the way in which you will have to live. I'm not going to talk about the other things that will happen...
Ready for the future, comrade?
Follow?
Not now, I'm pretty tired...

We have food, we have weapons and we oppose the invaders. What more is needed before we can finally move to action? My plan is to win the enemy by discouraging them, to the point where the Regent of England says he no longer wants anything to do with France. Then they will come and pick up the soldiers, throw them in a boat and they all disappear.
I suppose even you have suffered because of this war.

No do not get me wrong, even if I have lost loved ones in this war, I do not like unless France and I work only for her own good. Before the fighting, I was the Guild Master in a quiet town. You know what happened out there? The English besieged us. We informed them of our capitulation, but were caught in a fury caused by their last battle that ended in a failure. They burned everything and killed everyone except those who were able to escape. Fortunately I was one of them. You see, people aspire to a quiet life and that requires not getting beat up. We are at peril because it's impossible to live with the Englishmen.
What will you do then?

A vanguard was discovered by one of our patrols not far from the castle Puy, a few miles from there. It's evident that the Englishmen intend to besiege the castle to ensure a base of operations in our sector. They probably expect the public to denounce the position of the rebels. I think the plan is to move in and conquer the south of France in due time. We desperately need to weaken their grip on the region so they'll have no choice but to fall back to Guyenne. At least for a moment they are not expected to make a move. Can you take care of this, comrade?
I'm not opposed to the idea of working against the English, indefinitely.
Your cause brings me nothing and I need gold, I'll see the camp later.

We thank you. The camp where they gather is located near the castle Puy, I'll mark it on your map. The operation is not very complicated, they should not expect us. Stay together and attack small groups. That should even things out with them having better training, equipment and experience. I'll ask other groups to join. Don't worry, we will have enough people, but we must act quickly before they receive reinforcements.
Ok, I'm going to head there.
Good luck and be valiant in battle. May God accompany you.
So how did it go with the convoy?
We got them!

What? I can't believe my ears, ha ha! This is a great victory for the rebellion, believe me. Celebrate it like one and we see later for the rest. I see you have kept some weapons from the convoy. Keep them with you, they are well earned! See you later okay? Let me enjoy this victory.
So how did it go with the convoy?
Slightly wrong.
Slightly wrong? But this can't be true! ... Listen, we'll talk later okay?
So how did it go with the convoy?
I haven't found it yet.
I can't handle it sorry.
That can't be true... I don't want to overwhelm, but lives depended on the result of this mission. Listen, see you later, okay?
How may I help you?
Tell me about the resistance.
What do you think of the Freelancer mercenary company?
What do we do now?

Currently our forces are scattered throughout France. We have only recently begun to gather into groups and organize to fight under the initiative of a mysterious noble, who calls himself the Unicorn. You might have heard of him but nobody really knows his true identity.

They are bastards who work for the highest bidder. Their leader is an unscrupulous noble who is greedy enough to surround himself with the strongest of men and then proceed to shakedown the weakest. Today they are on our side but tomorrow they will be against us. I feel our cause is just.

Now that we are satisfied, we must continue arming ourselves. What we do not have unlike the English and Burgundian soldiers is proper training. I think we can compensate by arming ourself better. Crossbows, culverins, the sharpest and most piercing weapons made out of best steel.
Sounds like a good start, but where to find such expensive weapons?
The English arms depots that supply fortified towns and their outposts. By taking those shipments not only do they fail to rearm their troops but those weapons end up in our hands.
It requires careful planning.

A new front is opening not far from here. Our enemy seeks to prevent suspicious rebel movement they have spotted north of our position. What they are likely seeing is rebels converging in their area of operation. If we were to annihilate them, that would discourage their efforts to deploy throughout France. We would force them to fortify their key positions, opening up the countryside for us.
A plan worthy of grand marshal!

Thank you. The problem is that their hosts are small, but they are well equipped. It would be wasteful to attack them head on. We must be crafty. At this point we should observe our enemies from afar and allow them time to make a mistake without our interference. We make plans for an ambush for which an opportunity will eventually present itself. Then we act. Naturally, you will be joining us?
I am!
For now, I prefer to remain neutral.

This is perfect! The next weapons convoy shouldn't take too long to appear. You are to intercept it near Rodez. Seek rebel groups and convince them to join you in the assault. If you do not find any in the area, try around Bourges. Good luck, mate.
Incredible! You have them, you have the supplies! We get to eat! How can we thank you, comrade?
Find some way.
It was nothing.

Of course, now that you are one of us, I'll let you in on our secrets. We are mainly supported by the common folk. Some pretend to have a sudden admiration for England, but in reality they put aside weapons and other resources for us. For you I have a contact in Bordeaux, the bookseller. If you are in need just say that the archangel Michael is hungry and he'll know what to do.
I'll remember that.
Will you bring us food?
Working on it.
So you changed your mind? My men are on the verge of starvation, just go get us some food please.
It's okay, I'll bring you food.
I can't, I already have enough problems as it is.
Really? We count on you. I beg you, do not disappoint. They expect a real meal after having to resort eating scraps for weeks.
Do not touch your weapons, tell me who you are?
I am {playername}. Michel sent me, we travelled together and he told that there's work to be done. He also told about a potential reward.
...about that reward. Well, frankly I don't approve of Michel's methods. Although we certainly sent for help, he shouldn't have lied about the reward.
I see.

In fact we have nothing and we are in the progress of slowly being eaten away by hunger. Our cause is just, which I hope will affect you enough for you to join us. Believe me, sooner or later we will return to you hundredfold what you could do for us right now.
Well, what can I do to help you?
So this is kind of an investment? In that case, what can I do for you?
This is a waste of my time, adieu.

Well, as you can see, we have no provisions. I have to quickly find something to eat for my men or they'll wither away. Mutiny is not out of the question. I feel that to boost their morale, a barrel of beer, bread, cheese and dried meat is the least I can do.
It's okay, I'll see what I can do.
I can't, I already have enough problems as it is.
