Hello friend, my name is Fourreau, where do you come from?
From everywhere.
Why this nickname?
Like all of us I guess, you be careful.
Well, is it? Say that I have success with the ladies ....
It is fine. I understand
Hello and welcome, I am Tibaut.
Greetings, my name is {playername}.
Always stay on guard.
Halt! Who are you, and what are you doing in the middle of the forest?
I am looking for the rebels, the chief of Montpellier sent me to find you.
It is fine, enter. I am called La Ripaille.
I am {playername}.
La Ripaille?

Yes, because I like to party and drink, but not too much otherwise I fight with anyone. Dominique had to knock me out when I attacked him. He then started to avoid staying near me when I drink. You have been warned.
Good morning my friend, my name is Poignard, and these woods are my home. To tell the truth,  have experienced many things in these woods, believe me.
I believe you, you look like a strong fighter.
Poignard? Dagger? Do you plan to give me a nickname too?
It's possible, it will depend on your actions, I hope not to have to call you coward.
Do not go too far, it's not because you are six that I would let myself be insulted.
Ha, ha, ha! But your name is already found ... {playername} the Fool.
I'm not sure I can get used to you.
I am Antoine, welcome my friend.
Thank you, I will stay for some time, I have an account to settle with the Burgundians.
Thank you, I hope I can make a few coins here.
You are in the right place then.

Well, I guess it should be possible, as long as you respect our laws. They are simple, do not take from poor and remain faithful to the Kingdom of France. I also look away should you choose to loot corpses.
Good luck for the future, on our side, we will manage, as always.
Take care.
So? Have you changed your mind, do you want to meet Licorne?
All right, I agree.
Not yet, I have too much to do.

Perfect, he will come to you in the garden of Poitiers. As soon as he knows that you have entered the city, he will give you the instructions when you see him. We will continue to fight against the Burgundians, as always. Thanks for everything, friend, and always keep hoping that he will come.
Hello friend, I have returned. So this stronghold?
She is ours!

I knew you would succeed, I'm not doubted for a moment. When I met Licorne, he told me about interesting projects. I told him about you, and if you wish, you could work directly for him and help him to realize his plans, what do you say?
All right, I agree.
Not for the moment, I have too much to do.

Perfect, he will come to you in the garden of Poitiers. As soon as he knows that you have entered the city, he will give you the instructions when you see him. We will continue to fight against the Burgundians, as always. Thanks for everything, friend, and always keep hoping that he will come.
Hello friend, I have returned. So this stronghold?
We have not arrived.

It's not possible, I told you to prepare your plan before. Well, we can not do anything now. I met Licorne, and he told me about interesting projects. I told him about you, and if you wish, could you work directly for him and help him realize his plans, what do you say?
All right, I agree.
Not for the moment, I have too much to do.

Perfect, he will come to you in the garden of Poitiers. As soon as he knows that you have entered the city, he will give you the instructions when you see him. We will continue to fight against the Burgundians, as always. Thanks for everything, friend, and always keep hoping that he will come.
{playername}? When will you go to the stronghold? We are all counting on you.
I must prepare, I will go there as soon as possible.
So? Are you ready to take my men to the stronghold ?
Yes I am ready.
I have to prepare as much as possible.
This is what I like to hear, and remember, take the time to observe from a distance and plan the attack, friends. As for me, a long journey awaits.

{playername}, I'm glad you are here. For the help you provided, I decided to reward you as best as I can. As you know we have nothing, but there are contacts that supply us when we really need it. Gp see the gravedigger in the graveyard of Calais, and tell him this: the angels of Dominique require a sword. He will give you what he has gathered for us, I'm sure you'll use it well.
What can we do to press the Burgundians of New Dominique?
Who is this gravedigger?
Thank you, everything helps. I must go now, but I will come back as soon as possible.
Anything else you'd like to ask me?

He used to be one of ours, but he was injured and had to leave us. However, he has continued fighting the good fight, by helping us hide our weapons or anything else in fake graves in the cemetery of Calais.
We can do better than that, and we will take their stronghold.
Take a stronghold with seven men? You must be joking.

No, just you six, I will not come, as I am meeting Licorne. But I assure you, there is only a handful defending the place. I entrust you with the command, {playername}. I have been observing you and I know that you will be up for this task. Do not let the men charge blindly, I also recommend that you take a higher ground to coordinate the attack.
I believe in you, friends. By St. Michael, you will take this place and Licorne will decide what to do next.
Very well, I would take this place alone, if it is necessary.
I'm not yet ready, could you wait a while?
Very well, but do not drag on too much. I can postpone my departure, but not forever.
This is what I like to hear, and remember, take the time to observe at a distance and plan the attack. Farewell, friends, a long journey awaits.

Ah, here you are. It was a beautiful fight in Metz, is it not? These dogs got what they deserved, and we finally have our bellys filled. Here is your reward, I hope that you will apreciate the loot taken from the Bourgignons. It was really good work friend, thank you.
It was a pleasure, really.
Well, we can say that we failed. At least we could have stale bread and stinking water in the dungeon, except that I even hungrier than before leaving for this cursed warehouse.
What more can we do? At least we will have tried.
Bah! I do not want to talk.
Go ahead and wait for us at the river.
Good.
I do not think I can do it.
But that's not true ... oh well, go where you want, traitor.

Greetings my friend, I am Dominique, if you are in the heart of the forest, you must have read my message hidden in the grave and you have been able to decipher it ...a moment please, if you are not one of us, then you must find this conversation rather... strange.
Do not worry I'm a rebel, the chief of Montpellier sent me, and I found your message.

Well, we are starting on a good foundation then. You did well to come to us, we have difficulties  carrying out our operations. The towns of Burgundy are too well guarded, and our goal is to harass the Burgundian enemy in his own territory, even during the truces.
What can we do to fight the Burgundians?
Do you not feel like fighting for nothing sometimes?
Why did you leave the camp at the city of Toul?
I have to leave, but we will resume this conversation later.
Do you have any other questions?

I do not want to hear about that horrible place. It is impossible think about it without being distressed, and it has become unbearable. We really had to leave and we are much better here for the moment.
And what do you propose? To enlist in the guard of Charles VII? It's not better believe me. We must fight again, until we are numerous enough and we will follow the instructions of Licorne.
Who?

Then you have not heard of Licorne? He is the leader of all the rebels, at least he will become one. I already met him and he told me to come here. He is a great strategist, the war will be won as soon as we meet under his banner.

We have no food, so to start, we should attack a caravan. However, there is something  simpler and less dangerous. The warehouses of Metz, receives the food for the duke's soldiers from Germany daily. It is not very well guarded and we just have to get rid of the few guards to be able to take all the food we need. The problem occurs if we get noticed and patrols search the forests, however we will see how it goes once we have a full stomach. Will you accompany us?
All right, I follow you, I'm starving.
Not for the moment, I'll come back later.

Very well ... ah, by the way, if we were separated in the battle, we will of course meet here at this place of the forest. Well, I think everything is ready we can leave, we will meet again in Metz, pass by the river below and wait for us at the bottom of the door of the Germans.
Let's go to camp.
Do not take long.
We do not want to fail, let's take the time to plan.
It will be alright...
Come on, we pick up the food and we go from here.
Do not take long.
We do not want to fail, let's take the time to plan.
It will be alright...
Take the food and go.
Do not take long.
We do not want to fail, let's take the time to plan.
It will be alright...
Let's go now.
Do not take long.
We do not want to fail, let's take the time to plan.
It will be alright...
We had them! Take everything you can and go. We'll meet back at camp.
Do not take long.
Go kill the guard at the entrance of the bridge, drop a tile on his head. We will send the signal as soon as he is dead and we attack.
I'll go.

We are here, it seems to be well presented. Here take that crossbow and those tiles, do you see the stone gateway down there before the bridge? The guard is alone, moreover when you kill him you will have a very good position to cover us, but pay attention to their arrows. As soon as the guard is dead, we send the signal and attack. Go! Now.
Do not take long, I'll be alone in the gate for a while.
So, jump from the roof of the tower to the river and they will be stuck in the gate and we will pick them covered by their archers in the gate itself.
Get out.
I have no desire to stay here.
Get out.
I have no desire to stay here.
Get out.
I have no desire to stay here.
Get out.
I have no desire to stay here.
Get out.
I have no desire to stay here.
Get out.
I have no desire to stay here.
Get out.
I have no desire to stay here.
Hey there! What are you doing here?
I do not have time to let you finish your last meal, I'm sorry.
Get out, do not go near the warehouse.
I have no desire to stay here with you, no worries.
Hello, what can I do for you?
I am looking for the rebel materials, if you please.
Nothing, I was just walking around.
Sorry? You must be mistaken.
Oh, that's right ... Dominique's angels want a sword.

It's good, friend. Give me time to unearth the chest, here ... there is the enough to forge weapons, if you do not know how to do it right, you have only to resell the everything, I hope it will help you anyway. Good luck.
Thank you for the goods, looking forward to seeing you again ... in another place.
Good morning visitor, do you come to gather on a grave?
Not really, I got lost.
You'd better get back to town before dark, the wolves roam around here, and in the evening fall, the place and pretty spooky.
Do you know if the beer has arrived Sir? He had to bring it up with the rest of the supplies.
I do not know anything about it, but refueling in the mountains in times of war must not be so simple.
What a beautiful place, and so well protected tactically, I feel safe here.
A haven of peace at the top of the mountains, far from the war, only dream of better by the times.
What a beautiful landscape, is not it?
Really dazzling indeed.
Good morning, what are you doing here?
I myself captivated by this place, with a handful of brave men.
Really? I'll buy you a pint after my guard in this case.
Hello, are we going for a walk?
This place reminds me of old memories.
Ah yes? Well, you can stay without restrictions in this case.
Greetings, I am responsible for the defense of this place, what can I do for you, friend?.
In what way does this stronghold serve the rebellion?
Nothing, I'm just passing through.

We contribute to the French domination by causing damage to the Burgundians, moreover if the troops of Charles VII wanted to attack Dijon to force the Duke of Burgundy to stop serving the interests of the King of England, this is where they would prepare the attack. An advanced post in enemy territory could not be more secure and comfortable.
Is there work for me here?
Thank you for the information, goodbye.
Not for the moment, we have the situation in hand, but thank you for your help.
{playername}, it's good to see you again. What are you doing here ?
I'm sorry, but I lost the letter of recommendation, do you have another?
I had just remembered all these moments.
Well, it's not uncommon to lose such a thing, I hope that being a Knight is important enough for you to take care of it.
My apologies.

Look, here it is. It lacks the illuminations that my scribe had made for you, the king will not have the opportunity to admire them, but in time of war it would be enough to have a name engraved on a stone to recruit new Knights.
What are you doing here heretic? How could you refuse to confess?
I have other beliefs about men and religion, goodbye.
{playername}, are you purified from your sins?
I am Messire, will you give me this letter for the King?

Of course, here it is. I would be happy to count among ourselves a noble man of heart and strong spirit. However, even with this letter, you will still have to win the favors of the king. Becoming a Knight without a noble name is more difficult than you think.
{playername}, are you purified from your sins?
I'll take care of it Messire.
I do not want to confess, I will obtain this letter in other ways.
How? You are a heretic! Out of my sight.
{playername}, how good it is to see you again. You have become a hero, did you know that?
What do you mean ?

Do you not know? The common people call you the Black Death. Don't be alarmed, people do not think you are a plague, but they mean that those who meet you, end up dead. In any case, the general and the enemy governors have tripled their guards and it is a good thing that they are afraid.
I have a favor to ask of you, Sir.
I must leave you Messire. I'll speak with you at another time.
I'm listening...
I truly desire to become a Knight, and I need a letter of recommendation for that to give to the king. You are noble, are you not? Can you recommend me?
No, it's nothing ...

Well, I would normally refuse an assassin to become a Knight, but ... it's because of me that you had to indulge in these ... murders, moreover it was for the good of France. So, I accept, with eyes closed.
Believe me, Messire, it is men who make good knights, not laws.
Certainly ... but first of all you must confess, then you will have my letter, and once a Knight by the grace of Saint Michael, you must, in spite of everything keep to the laws.
Where can I confess?
At the cloister of the Jacobins in Toulouse. They are the ones who prepare our knights for their purification in order to swear an oath. You have the makings of a great Knight, {playername}.
{playername}, you're alive! How did it go?
The merchant fell, a victim of poison.
Excellent news! We will win the war, that's for sure! This is your reward, 1000 crowns, you will become a rich man at this pace, do not change the ideal for as much.
{playername}, you're alive! How did it go?
I could not poison him, I apologize.
Well, I guess you did your best ...
{playername}, I hope you have not changed your mind about our business.
I'll take care of it Messire.
It's too dangerous, I do not want to lose my life.
{playername}, There is one more thing you can do for me.
Another brazen assassination?

I fear it. He is a Burgundian whom we all want to see disappear, he is a rich merchant and an incredibly rich businessman. It finances part of the equipment of the Burgundian troops, if the brave French are torn off the battlefield by a ballista, he is responsible.
Where, when, and for how much?
I have no hesitation in killing people, do you believe that?

Go find him in his mansion in Metz, he has started festivities for a week. If he died, his fortune will go to his young son, who committed not to use it for the arming of the Duke of Burgundy... It is unfortunate to come to such situations, but it is really the son who has sought to meet a group of rebels to assassinate his father.
You forget the reward.
Indeed, my apologies, I guess another 1000 crowns should be enough, will you handle it? And of course, do not mention my name or our meeting places if you were caught, not even under torture.
Done, for 1000 crowns, I rise to the challenge.
I do not want to take such risks, I want to live. Goodbye.

Thank you, you save my life once again {playername}. Here, take this vial of poison, and if our man drinks even a drop of it, he would succumb within minutes. Make sure he swallows it, and as soon as he is on the ground, run away as far as possible.
{playername}, tell me that this damned governor is dead.
The monster is dead.
I can hardly believe it, I do not know how to thank you. Here is our agreed price, and receive my most sincere thanks.
These missions are difficult to say the least, men have lost their lives to help me, they are heroes, make sure that their families are helped in return.
It is unfortunate, but there were no other solutions, I would ensure that their families receive land and considerable benefits. Believe me, they did not die for nothing, when become a living legend.
I'll do without it, goodbye.
{playername}, tell me that this damned governor is dead.
I could not do anything, they were on horseback and I could not find a weapon.
It's a disaster, but I do not blame you, we should have been more creative, but time was running out.
{playername}, tell me that this damned governor is dead.
I will take care of it, do not worry.
It's way too complicated, I can not.
{playername}, I have something for you if you are still interested, it will bring you 1000 crowns in any case.
I am listening.
I need time to recover from my last mission, maybe later.

This time it is a troublesome British governor. Nominated to replace lords gone to war, he manages the lands in their places. The problem is that he is mistreating the population and the peasants in occupied territory. This situation has become unsustainable for many people, even for some English people.
Where and when should I eliminate him?.

He often goes hunting in the area of Senlis, you will find him sooner or later in his camp, but be careful, he is always surrounded by his guards. Find a way to approach him, but of course, go there unarmed or you'd stopped, then run away as soon as you have done the deed.
For 1000 crowns, I am your man.
It seems too risky, I would carry it out some other time. Goodbye.
Well, go alone, be careful, and do not be discovered until the last moment to kill him.
Happy to see you again. What about the Count?
The Count is no more.
Congratulations. Things will get better and better now in the Caen region. Thank you, and here is 1000 crowns for the payment, come back soon if you are still interested.
Happy to see you again. What about the Count?
He is still alive, they were too many and I could not do anything.
It's unfortunate, I regret, but in this case there is no reward. I might have another mission for you soon, hoping you'll succeed this time.
Well, sir? The ... job, is it done ?.
I committed myself to it, Messire, do not worry.
Well ... I need another invitation, I lost it.
I apologies, I cannot kill a man in such a way. I must refuse.
Lost? Be careful, it is not so simple to redo these false documents, here is another, and keep the good this time.
To be honest with you, I'm pretty disappointed, you are committed, more you delay my plans. I'll find another assassin.

Greetings, here you are finally at Poitier my friend. The different rebel leaders counted on your devotion to our cause. I need someone competent for a mission of utmost importance and you seem to be the right person.
I hate the English and the Burgundians, I am your man.
Your cause brings me nothing, will you pay me for this job?
Who are you, Sir?
My apologies, but I am exhausted by all these trips, can we resume this conversation later?
Do you have any questions?
I can not reveal to you my identity, call me the Licorne, like all the leaders I receive.
Naturally, I apologize for my lack of hospitality, but you will sleep in the tavern. I can not have a known rebel in my apartments, it would destroy my cover. I wish you a good evening, all the same.
Naturally I will pay you in gold crowns for each contract you perform, provided that you fulfill the objectives defined by the mission.
It suits me, what is the mission?
I need to think about it, I'll come back later.

The small groups of rebels I want to gather are busy attacking convoys, robbing Burgundian peasants, and stealing food baskets. All this will not take us anywhere. I have to defeat the invader more harshly, more radically, yet this work is unworthy of a gentleman and contrary to the spirit of chivalry to which I adhere.
I fear the worst.

I need an assassin, someone to approach the enemy close enough to be able to deal a fatal blow, someone cunning and has experience with weapons. But at the same time, someone who does not aspire to become a Knight, in return you will lead the good life with what I pay you, what do you say ?.
I want to be a Knight, but I would live with it if it is for the good of France.
Only gold interests me ... a lot of gold, I agree.
I must refuse Sir, I also aspire to the spirit of courtesy and respect towards my enemies.

Well, the first target is the Comte de Caen. He is a very active and repressive general towards our French subjects in the occupied cities, we must get rid of him as soon as possible, the king himself desires his death ardently and secretly.

He is having a banquet at the ducal castle of Caen. Here is a forged invitation to give to the guards, with the seal of the Count himself made by our scribes. Go to the castle, mingle with the guests, and find a way to get rid of this character.

Once the Count is dead, jump down onto the street, and join the rebel who will have you out of the city through shortcuts before the guard is alerted, then leave the city. Good luck my friend, we are counting on you.

Greetings, here you are finally at Poitier my friend. The different rebel leaders counted on your devotion to our cause. I need someone competent for a mission of utmost importance and you seem to be the right person.
I hate the English and the Burgundians, I am your man.
Your cause brings me nothing, will you pay me for this job?
Who are you, Sir?
My apologies, but I am exhausted by all these trips, can we resume this conversation later?
Do you have any questions?
I can not reveal to you my identity, call me the Licorne, like all the leaders I receive.
Naturally, I apologize for my lack of hospitality, but you will sleep in the tavern. I can not have a known rebel in my apartments, it would destroy my cover. I wish you a good evening, all the same.
Naturally I will pay you in gold crowns for each contract you perform, provided that you fulfill the objectives defined by the mission.
It suits me, what is the mission?
I need to think about it, I'll come back later.

The small groups of rebels I want to gather are busy attacking convoys, robbing Burgundian peasants, and stealing food baskets. All this will not take us anywhere. I have to defeat the invader more harshly, more radically, yet this work is unworthy of a gentleman and contrary to the spirit of chivalry to which I adhere.
I fear the worst.

column3: I need an assassin, someone to approach the enemy close enough to be able to deal a fatal blow, someone cunning and has experience with weapons. But at the same time, someone who does not aspire to become a Knight, in return you will lead the good life with what I pay you, what do you say ?.

column2: I want to be a Knight, but I would live with it if it is for the good of France.
Only gold interests me ... a lot of gold, I agree.
I must refuse Sir, I also aspire to the spirit of courtesy and respect towards my enemies.

Well, the first target is the Comte de Caen. He is a very active and repressive general towards our French subjects in the occupied cities, we must get rid of him as soon as possible, the king himself desires his death ardently and secretly.

He is having a banquet at the ducal castle of Caen. Here is a forged invitation to give to the guards, with the seal of the Count himself made by our scribes. Go to the castle, mingle with the guests, and find a way to get rid of this character.

Once the Count is dead, jump down onto the street, and join the rebel who will have you out of the city through shortcuts before the guard is alerted, then leave the city. Good luck my friend, we are counting on you.
I raise my glass to our honourable guest, what news of the front, sire?
Sorry?
I don't give a damn about you. Isn't that how they talk up there? The English aristocrats? Give me your stuff.
Doesn't it trouble you, robbing others?
That's what I thought.
Did you hear that? This moron wants to teach me morals. Listen carefully. What I do not have and that others have, I will take tomorrow, is our motto down here.
What are you looking at?
I was wondering if you ... well ....
What is a girl like you doing in this place? Do you want me to get you out of here?
Nothing at all.
Only with Messire Villandrandro, do you understand? So be on your way.
Are you joking? Up there is war and famine, here I live like a queen. I am richer than the wife of the Duke of Burgundy. In exchange for all that, I do not give a fuck to see the sun.
Be careful, watch your movements, that we do not take them for an attack on Messire Villandrandro.
You should drink and relax, no one wants to kill your boss.
What do you want?
I'm just admiring your face.
What's up, did you see a ghost?
Open up, it seems that the boss has work for me.
Get me out of here.
Very funny, really ...
It's okay, you can go. Prepare to meet Messire Villandrandro.
But of course, my duchess. Bertrand will immediately climb all the stairs to open the door. This is the last time you make me climb up.
What is a soldier? I do not offer my charms if that is what you wanted.
Take me to the catacombs instead.
You are really too ugly. I would rather a woman who smells like the pigsty.
Are you tired of the sun? Very well, follow me and you know the rule, put this bag on your head.
Soldier, approach a little here ...
If you want gold, I do not have any.
No, it is too much trouble.
No, you're wrong, I do not want to take your gold, but give you gold.
A charity?
That's exactly it ... in a way. My friends and I are looking for someone who have nimble hands and who runs fast in case of problems.
I need money, tell me more about it.
Like everyone else, we'll tell you more if you follow. I feel better in our place, I do not like hanging out in the street.
If only to speak, we will see later.
If you think I'm going to follow you to your ambush, go away.

Finally, It took some time to find someone... take this torch, you will need it where we are going, and because we do not know you yet, you will make the trip with this bag on your head. You will have to come back later with the guard. Once there, you'll have to go down until you meet the leader. Let's go...
What do you want ?
Can you make forged documents?
I need gold again.
Nothing, I have better things to do than breathe the mold.
No, there is nothing for you, your face is known, I need new blood.
Of course, but you would have to pay the price, what do you think?
I aspire to become a Knight, but I need a letter of recommendation, and ...
Duke of Provence, how's it going? It will cost you 4000 crowns, but with your future situation you will earn much more. Deal?
It's understood.
I should be able to get it honestly, nevermind.
Voila, you think you're not the only one to make such requests, my chest is full. All these letters are signed and bear the seal of the Duke, it was not easy, but I knew I would get what I deserved.
So? Have you avenged us?
Yes, it was not easy but he and his wife died, here is his medal.
It's perfect, the matter is settled, here's your gold, I'll fall asleep more easily now ..
So? Have you avenged us?
It turns out that he was armed with a crossbow and had bodyguards, I could not ...
What? It's a simple wounded peasant? You're really a shit, out of here.
So? You have work, right?
I know, I'll take care of it
I do not want to kill a man who did not do anything to me, I will not do it.
Are you stupid? Get out of here then.
So? You have work, right?
I know, I'll take care of it
I do not want to kill a man who did not do anything to me, I will not do it.
Are you stupid? Get out of here then.
Come closer, I have something to ask you.
What is it?
No, I do not like it, goodbye.
Someone sold me out, someone who works for me as you do now. I want the head of this traitor. I will pay 600 crowns, are you in?
For 600 crowns? I agree.
No...

This son of a bitch has a new life with the gold that my head brought him, he has a farm and a family, he settled near the village of Rennes, his nickname is Mathieu le Fileux, find him there and kill him. Bring me the medal around his neck for proof and you'll get paid.
Okay.
I can not do that, he has a family.
Do you have the gold of the merchants? I am getting impatient.
Here's the gold. You have to trust me.
It's a word I do not know, everything is there, now go away.
I have lost it, but I will replace it, I swear it.
That is not good at all. You have three days to find 900 crowns, do you hear? Without that I'll loose my dogs after you, Go now ...
Do you have the gold of the merchants? I am getting impatient.
That's exactly why I'm in Paris, I wanted to let you know.
I do not want to become an outcast, I refuse.
Try not to disobey me, I can send my dogs to hunt you if you do not collaborate, remember it.

Look who is here, it's our apprentice thief. You come at the right time. I just remembered that nobody cares to collect the fees from the merchants of Paris, could you take care of it? You will receive a percentage in return, what do you say?
What fees?
No, not now.
What the merchants owe us in exchange for our protection, you just have to go see them and tell them they have not paid them.
If I can get something back, it seems easy.
No, I would not do that, goodbye.
It could not be more simple, go see the blacksmith, the gunsmith and the wholesaler, tell them to pay and make them afraid if they refuse. Being brutal and boorish, I think you can do that.
Do you have the jewelry?
Here it is, it cost me much more than if I had honestly done it.
Yes! That is it, beautiful. Here are your 1000 crowns, Villandrandro always keep his word. Come back to me if you need gold, I'll definitely have something for you.
We'll see.
I hope you do not show up in front of me without the jewelry.
I'm on the case.
I can not become the enemy of France, I refuse.
It is quite another to become my enemy, you will learn it at your expense. Now go, you shameful bastard.
So, what about this key?
Here you go.

Perfect, keep it, it was a test. I wanted to see if you had guts. This key, my boy, opens a chest in a castle of Tours, jewels and other valuable items are stored there. Bring me a gold ring set with a blue stone, if you come back with, I'll buy it for 1000 crowns. What do you say?
I say it's worth more than that.

Of course, but what would you do with it? It is a very famous jewelery in France, I can only sell it to my contacts. You have no one to sell it to and you will end your days in jail. If you agree, keep the key to the safe and go to the old castle district in Tours, find a way to enter the vault and bring me the ring.
It's okay, I will not get caught. Nobody will know that I did it.
Well and good, my prayers are with you, as the Jesuits say.
I have to think about it.
So, what about this key?
I lost it.
And with it, my esteem and a lot of gold. Now go, you rascal.
What are you waiting for, my signal? Go now.
Ah, very good, I ....
I can not do that, I give up.
So get out of here rascal.
What do we have here? Approach, you seem to be suitable for the job. You're not sick at least, and do you think you're good enough?
It depends, I need gold but I do not want to kill anyone.
I do not have business with thieves, goodbye.

You will not need to kill if you are agile and clever enough. I need someone who knows how to pick a pocket correctly and without being caught. I need a key, this key is in the coat of a nobleman, who is in the brothel of fancy neighborhoods. Make your way there and take it from him, then bring it back to me, you'll be paid as soon as I get it.
Sounds doable, it'll be done, if I have gold in return.
Why do not you send one of your men?
I'm sorry, I do not want to go to the dungeon, goodbye.
My boys are too well known, as soon as a guard sees them they will find themselves in dungeons, I need new blood.

Very well, make your way to the House of the Two Sirens tonight. Approach the Chamberlain and take his key. He always puts it in his right pocket... no need to tell you not to get drunk and finish your night in a bed without taking care of that key. And one last thing, above all, avoid getting caught.
Approach my friend, you are here at home.
What grace, my Lady, your neck is as vibrant as the most beautiful silks.
It is a place of debauchery and sin, I cannot stay another moment, goodbye.
You flatter me Noble Sire, perhaps we will have the opportunity to speak again as the night goes on.
I hope so with all my heart.
Are you not the handsome Knight, Messire Count of Caen?
Yes, it is I.
You are mistaken, Madam.
I have a deep admiration for you Sire, allow me to join you tonight.
I thought rather that the Count of Caen was a brute who starved his subjects.
It would be my pleasure, Madam.
What a beautiful person, I am in admiration Messire.
It's a shared admiration.
Or maybe you want what is in my purse?
What do you want Messire, why are you talking to me?
I thought I recognized someone.
Having a good evening, my dear friend?
We will see.
You again? What do you want?.
Chamberlain,, hum ... Sir, I must speak to you, it is of the utmost importance.
Where did you get this coat? It would suit me well.
Forgive me, I made a mistake.
My God, your manners... I had it done in Paris, you only have to go there, leave us now.
What beautiful silk, can I touch it ?
Well, keep your addresses for yourself.
Certainly not, go away or I will call the guard ..
Why come to see me here, is it so urgent?
It is, my lord, the time is serious.
No, it can wait. Finish your ... business.
No, who doesnt have enough problems. But first, you are you?
I am sent by the king, he wants you to follow me right away.
The scribe cannot find a document, he needs it right away. Please go to your office now.
Come immediately to church with me, you must confess on the spot.
Your wife is suffering, a terrible accident my Lord.
What is this story? It does not make sense.
(Reach into the pocket of the Chamberlain.)
(You run away.)
What are you doing? THIEF! GUARDS!.
Oh my God! Is it bad? I will leave right away ...
(Reach into the pocket of the Chamberlain.)
Leave without doing anything.
What is it? But what do you want me to say?
Chamberlain, hum ... Sir, I must speak to you, it is of the utmost importance.
Where did you buy this coat, Sir? It would suit me well.
Forgive me, I made a mistake.
My God, your manners... I had it done in Paris, you only have to go there, leave us now.
What beautiful silk, can I touch it ?
Well, keep your addresses for yourself.
Certainly not, go away or I will call the guard ..
Why come to see me here, is it so urgent?
It is, my lord, the time is serious.
No, it can wait. Finish your ... business.
No, who doesnt have enough problems. But first, you are you?
I am sent by the king, he wants you to follow me right away.
The scribe cannot find a document, he needs it right away. Please go to your office now.
Come immediately to church with me, you must confess on the spot.
Your wife is suffering, a terrible accident my Lord.
What is this story? It does not make sense.
(Reach into the pocket of the Chamberlain.)
(You run away.)
What are you doing? THIEF! GUARDS!
Oh my God! Is it bad? I will leave right away ...
(Reach into the pocket of the Chamberlain.)
Leave without doing anything.
What? What do you want?.
I want to come in.
Nothing, I'm leaving.
Get the hell out of here, there's nothing for you here.
I have no time to lose... (pulls out his weapon).
We'll see.
Alert! An intruder!.
Stand back!
Alert! An intruder!.
Stand back!
Alert! Intruders in the castle!
No!
Alert! Intruders in the castle!
Can't be...
Alert! Intruders in the castle!
Damn.
Go away!
You won't see me again.
What... what do you want, who are you?
Don't be afraid, I just want to talk to your husband.
Don't worry about it, woman.
You should go now.
I'm leaving.
Who are you? What do you want?
Are you Matieu le Fileux?
... I have not been called like that for a long time, I imagine that pig Villandrandro paid you to find me.
That's right, he wants your head, nothing personal...
Maybe we can work it out, he just wants the medal you have around your neck, give it to me and it'll all be over.
Well, it has great value for me, but I guess I have no choice, here, and thanks stranger, whoever you are.
Go on...
Good morning to you too...
Not one more step! What are you doing here?
Are you a thief? I am armed, you should think twice before attacking me...
Thieves? No, we're rebels, honest citizens, what's left of them. And who are you?
I'm on your side, do you have a leader?
All right, I'm going, I just wanted to take a look at the place.
Well... okay, the chief's downstairs, near the fire, watch out, we're watching you.
Well, it's strange to see new faces, especially in a place like this.
It is also strange to see so many people living underground.
Tell me friend, what's the situation upstairs?
Paris is still under the English, the situation is delicate.
Paris is under the English at the moment, but it will soon change believe me.
Paris is liberated! You should get out of here...
I have no time for complacency, farewell.
Oh...I see. Let us pray that it will change, what else can we do?
I am hoping wholeheartedly, I'm ready to fight to free the city if I have to.
What ?! That is great! I... it would be funny to leave here like this, I'll wait a bit...
Welcome, whoever you are... I have things to sell if you are interested.
What do you have for sale?
No, thank you.
Weapons, and a few trinkets.
I assume you won't accept crowns?
Well, I prefer to trade with something that I can eat, but crowns could serve me later. Here, take a look.
Anything else?
I don't want to stay here anymore, I want to fight, tell them you come from above.
It's a bad idea, you're not trained and you have no protection, you're going to have a certain death.
There is a chance if we are united.
It's none of my business, sorry.
You are no better than the others, out of my sight ...
I knew it, you hear? Are you ready to fight?!
I prefer to stay here alive, rather than try to fight and lose my life, or worse to end up tortured in the dungeons of Paris.
Why not go back and live a quiet life in Paris?
It's none of my business, sorry.
Impossible, most of us would refuse to serve our enemies. What's more, we are outlaws! We would end up on the scaffold as soon as we see the light of day.
We'll meet outside.
Very well.
And good friend... are we going to besiege Paris?
Yes, now, join us at the siege camp outside.
It's not necessary, not now...
Finally! We will talk once outside, someone trustworthy like you would need to lead the rebels.
To arms, all of you! Pick up anything that could be used as weapons and go out, we'll fight for Paris!
We have succeeded, we have a little time before they send their next patrol. Again thanks friend, as promised come see us when the French will besiege Paris, we'll join you then.
This time will come sooner or later, take care of yourself.
Go through the door, we follow you to the Crypt... good luck.
Shoot as fast as you can, I'll finish them off.
Approach, friend. Now that the others are no longer hungry, we can talk seriously.
What do you want to talk about?
I don't want to be mixed up in your stories...

I want to talk to you about our condition. The English know that we are somewhere in the catacombs and they regularly send patrols, looking for us. They have never found this place, but a few days ago, our scouts have seen them coming dangerously close and they are currently camping in a crypt not far from here.

Impossible to even blink under these conditions, let alone sleep. So it is preferrable that it is we who attack them during their sleep. You seem to know how to fight and we are only poor archers, could you join us for the attack?
What would I gain in return?
It's far too dangerous, you can't even see a meter. I cannot help you.
Paris !
Excuse me?

Gather the men outside or tell the Dauphin that he can count on us if he besieges the city. We are not the best archers but we are very numerous in these galleries. If you manage skillfully, you can start the siege and you may be chosen to become the governor of the city and enjoy the wealth it could bring to you. What do you say?
I will have to put all this in place, but certainly... let's get rid of the patrol first.
These are the demented words of a desperate man. I would not go to the dungeon with you, farewell.
Ok! Everybody's ready. Check your equipment and go through the door behind me, we go straight to the crypt where the English sleep...
Do you have anything to eat, friend?
Yes, here's some cheese and bread.
How can I thank you? It is good to see that not everyone has lost their pity in these troubled times.
Food I beg you, these people will starve.
I'll see what I can do.
Come, don't be afraid. We are rebels, if you are on our side you have nothing to fear, if you were a spy on the other hand, your fear would be justified...
I'm against the English in any case, what are you all doing here underground?
I prefer to leave...
We are outlaws, we refuse to serve the English, and their friends, those Burgundian traitors. We stay here and we prepare what we can to take over the city as soon as the opportunity arises.
How do you survive?

We eat insects and rats in the best of cases. We go out to steal, only when we have found nothing, but it is very risky and most volunteers never come back... we do not know each other but, could you bring us some dinner? I beg you, there are women and weak people here.
It's okay, I'll see what I can find in Paris.
I can't, I'm sorry. Good luck...
Oh, really? I do not know what to say...and well, I think bread and cheese should suffice, if you come back, you will have really done a good deed believe me.
Blood... everywhere...
And you say you want to deliver the Battle of Paris.
They're dead.
In any case they already have their crypt.
We got 'em.
We're not hunting.
All that blood...
And you say you want to deliver the Battle of Paris.
They got what they deserved.
The place of a woman is surely not in a crypt nor to engage in war.
Have you come to gather in our chapel, my brother?
I'm looking for a sword.
That's right.
My brother, it is not here that you would find one, so let's go to town we are not blacksmiths.
But where do you get this sword, my brother?
You have a good chapel. It's probably been here since time immemorial.
What can I do for you, my brother?
I'm looking for a sword, would you have seen one around here?
Nothing, thank you.
Are you drunk? I suggest you leave.
Well, is that a sword?
Didn't I tell you? Jeanne la Lorraine asked me to pick her up, without even being sure of her existence, it seems to be a relic and she says she needs it to liberate France.
God Almighty! Then we'll pray for her.
Well, I don't see a sword, have you finished searching?
I want to go back to the chapel, I may not have looked at it with enough attention.
Yes, right now, but I'll be back.
I suspected it, and well, come in.
Peace be with you brother, what are you doing amongst us?
I'm looking for a sword, have you seen one in the vicinity?
I was going to go, thank you.
A sword you say? No, we're not armed see, why are you asking me that?
Can I look inside the chapel? It's very important.
It's enough, my brother, I refuse, leave now.

This is an order of the Dauphin Charles himself. There may be a relic in these walls, and I must take her back to Jeanne la Lorraine. If I find a sword in this chapel, it will be the proof of my statements, otherwise I would go away, do not fear.
Gather weapons to give them to a woman? If what you say is true, then France is lost. Enter if this is the only way for you to stop tormenting us.
No sudden gestures, nor speak louder than his lordship.
Let his lordship be sure, I have no desire to speak nor to strike.
I do not know how you thank, you have the makings of a great knight.
It was my duty.
These words don't cost you anything.
Out of my sight, you let my daughter die in this forest.
I understand.
So? Did you find my daughter?
I found her, and she is alive. It was some of your mercenaries that kidnapped her. They believed that their pay was too low and they committed this heinous act as a revolt against you.

What are you saying? Bastards... the culprits will be punished with death. I will gather an army of those that remained faithful and we will punish them. I will find sleep only after having wrenched their heads with my own hands.
When you, well, you suspect I can't pay you. It's horible, I'm ruined and it cost my daughter's virtue, and it could have cost her life
I apologise, but I lied to you. I don't own 10,000 crowns, will you forgive me or kill me?
You had no choice, I understand.
I risk my life for gold, find compensation immediately or I'll take everything you have.
You are worthy of the greatest knights, God bless you, sir.
Look, I can only give you 200 crowns, that's the all I have left, I'm sorry.
So? Did you find my daughter?
Unfortunately, I was wounded trying to save her.
What? Bastard ... what do you know, what did they do to her and who were they?
It was the mercenaries you were paying that violated her.
Unfortunately, I did not have time to see them, they hurt me with a arrow.

What are you saying? Bastards... the culprits will be punished with death. I will gather an army of those that remained faithful and we will punish them. I will find sleep only after having wrenched their heads with my own hands.
So? Did you find my daughter?
Not yet, but I'm on the trail.
I refuse to take care of this, find another stooge.
You! Approach... come closer.
What's the matter?
It is not my habit to stop on command, my lord.
Are you looking for work? You look like a mercenary.
Depends on the pay.
I'm not a mercenary, you're mistaken.
Brigands have taken my beloved daughter, only God knows where they took her. I would pay you 10,000 crowns if you bring her back to me, what do you say?
For such a sum, I would find her!
There is a catch, it seems like a certain death to me. I refuse..

Well, start by questioning the Tavern Keeper in our city of Rouen, he served foreigners that day. They concealed their faces under a hood, but he did not want to tell me about this subject, he probably heard information but he had to be threatened. Threaten him when you can, he may give you more clues, and come back with my poor daughter, only God knows what they did to her.
Did they ask for ransom?
Well no, that's what worries me, hasten on your quest I beg you.
Could we go? The wolves are getting closer.
Don't worry about it.
You killed them all! Thank you, sire, you are my savior, my champion, Grace be with you.
Let's not forget the 10,000 crowns.
It was my duty, Madam, let's go back to Rouen.

Did my father really promise you 10,000 crowns? But...he is ruined, it is impossible for him to pay you any crowns. Please, do not be too hard on him when you see him again, he lied to you to save me.
Can we leave now?
Who... who are you?
I'm here to save you gentle lady, stay away during the fight.
Don't pay any attention to me.
Lord, I am finally rescued. Be careful, these are the mercenaries my father hired and they know how to fight.
Hey! Who are you?
Release the girl or you will die.
Don't pay any attention to me, I just wanted to pick up some wood.
Ha, ha, ha how touching, the knight comes to save his beautiful lady, but you are alone and we are three strong fellows.
You will soon be only two, then you may be the last to die.
Show me if you fight as well as you speak, on guard.
What are you doing here, Knave? We're busy, don't you see?
What are you doing here with this lady?
Don't pay any attention to me, I just wanted to pick up some wood.
If you don't leave right now, we're going to cut your throat and throw you in the river.
Release the girl immediately.
Show me if you fight as well as you speak, on guard.
Hey, what are you doing here?
Do you have a lady with you?
Don't pay any attention to me, I just wanted to pick up some wood.

Ha, ha, no she is not for sale, she is ours, her father had hired us as mercenaries, but this pig son no longer pays, so we are paid with a good time with his daughter, and like that, justice is done.
I understand, I would even have a payment of 10,000 crowns for your heads.
What? You're going to die dirty pig.
Thank you for what you've done, don't worry about me, I'm fine, really.
Well, I have to leave you, ma'am.
Hey, you are here! Have You found my husband?
Yes, but I'm afraid that he admitted to his betrayal, he asks you to forget.
I found him, and he asked me to tell you that it will take time to prove his innocence.
It is not possible, are you sure? I ... I'll have to put this behind me then. Thank you for your honesty and for looking into it, messire.
What good news, I thank you, messire. I would have waited for a lifetime for my husband. Thank you, traveller.
Have you started looking for my husband?
I'm working on it, Madame.
Excuse me sir, you look like an adventurer. Are you travelling?
I just arrived. Why?
I am not interested.

Well, trips these days are quite dangerous, due to the war, and the roads are infested by robbers. However,  I must have news of my husband. You see, he is wrongfully accused of betrayal by the Dauphin Charles, but I am sure that there he is innocent. If you happen to meet my husband during your travels, tell him that his wife believes in his innocence, and that she will wait for him until this evil is righted.
What do I stand to gain in all of this?
You will find that ... I don't have the resources. For a small amount, say 200 crowns, please send him a message. I do not know where in Paris exactly, but you can tell him that Madeleine sent you.
Agreed. If I am in Paris, I will deliver your message.
I cannot do everything, farewell Madame.
How will I recognize him?
My husband has brown hair, young, has a mustache, and responds to the name, Bernard.
I am grateful to you, messire. You are a brave man.
What are we waiting for?
We start from this step...
What do you want? Leave me alone, please.
Are you Bernard?
Ok...
Who's asking?

Your wife, Madeleine sent me, she says that she thinks you are innocent from your judgment of treason, and she awaits your return. She said that you would give me 200 crowns for the message, and I am in a hurry.
Poor Madeleine, you know, I'm really a traitor, I don't deserve it. Just tell her to start over.. when I'm gone.
And my 200 crowns?
I don't have anything, as you can see. But I am truly grateful for your message.
I see, what are you going to do?
Probably take my life, I do not deserve to live after betraying my homeland and my wife.
Join my band, you have your vengeance against the English and perhaps redeem yourself who knows. Moreover, a warrior dies in battle, and don't forget that you still owe me 200 crowns.
I accept, I hope of regaining back my place at the side of my bride.
What do you want? I want to be alone, so please leave.
Are you a warrior?
Okay...
I am a knight.
You don't look much like a knight.
All right, thank you for giving your opinion, goodbye.
Well, what are we waiting for? My crossbow's going to rust.
Let's go.
I'm in a bad mood, so avoid offending me, whoever you are.
Having some trouble, Messire?
I would rather not speak to you in this case, whoever you are.

I had to go to the Marshmanship tournaments in Paris, but on the pretext that we are at war, the Lord of Paris refuses to welcome soldiers who served against him. It is not against the rules of the Archery Range, why make a mockery of noble traditions? Especially since it is not with such acts that the contenders to the throne of France will make themselves more legitimate.
You look like an excellent marskman, would you like to join? I pay very well for my mercenaries.
I wish you good luck, messire.
All right, I would ask you for 120 crowns, and I will follow you in your campaigns.
All right, here they are, try not to get yourself killed.
I cannot pay such a sum for a single mercenary.
Can we get started, comrade?
Forward...
Greetings, are you a messenger or do you have a message to send?
I am a messenger, and many other things depend on the opportunities.
None of that.
You are right, by the times that run you must know how to be flexible to earn a living, I am myself mercenary, soldier, Baker, Sinner, and Messenger.
Maybe you'd like to join an army? I want to gather men for various reasons.
It's inevitable indeed, I have to go now, have a good trip.
It's quite tempting, I would follow you for only 60 crowns, and the right to plunder the bodies of our enemies, what do you say?
A competent soldier? At that price? All right, come on.
I cannot pay such a sum for a single mercenary.
Well, what do you expect?
Let's go.
Hello, it seems to me that you aren't one of the locals. Please, who are you?
I'm {playername} and some business brought me to Bourges.
One who can be of interest to you.
Well, please forgive me this indiscretion, but I am on guard. In front of the Messengers Guild, which is one of the most boring jobs, believe me.
If your job bothers you, why don't you come with me? I'm gathering men to form a small party. My intentions are good and I think there's money to be made also for you.
Good luck.
Enough, I'm in! Provided that you pay me a signing bonus, say 100 crowns.
I'm delighted to have a former member of the Freelancers in my company.
I can't pay that kind of money, maybe later.
{playername}, do you need something or will you keep staring at me?
I took a hit to the head, help me please.
I took a cut to the arm, it's starting to smell...
My leg hurts with each step I take...

When I said you looked like you took a few too many hits to the head I didn't expect it to be as literal as that. Take a sit and stay straight so I can take a look at it. Mhm, I can take care of that but I'll need some material worth 200 crowns.
Did you think for a moment to clean the wound? Lord in Heaven, a day more and you'd be a cripple. Mhm, I can take care of that but I'll need some material worth 150 crowns.
Show me your leg. If you still want to be able to walk we'll have to clean that wound. Mhm, I can take care of that but I'll need some material worth 100 crowns.
Very well, here's the crowns, just hurry up it's starting to hurt badly.
I don't have that much on me right now...
I can't heal you without the right medicine and tools, I can prevent you from dying of an infection but without the items I need you will never make a full recovery.
Done, just be more careful next time.
You're not very friendly for a monk, what's your story?
I have God to discuss my sins, the affairs of Men don't interest me.
Why join my company then? A healer that avoids people seems like a contradiction to me.
This is the best way for me to fulfill His mission, I have a debt towards Him but I don't wish to discuss it now.
Goodbye then.
So, what are we waiting for?
On my way, father...
Speak to Father Jacob if you need something. Unless you are a mercenary that is...
Mercenary, indeed. I'm {playername}.
You are mistaken. I don't allow myself to hurt creatures of God's creation.
Good. You see, I'm seeking to join a group to practise and perfect my medical skills. It goes without saying that I won't work with a tyrant who sends troops to a certain death. Are you interested?
Actually, a healer would be of great use to me. You could stay in my camp to treat the wounded. What do you want in exchange?
I need fighters, not a priest. Thank you...

I don't need crowns but you could make a donation to the church, give me bread and ale in exchange for my services and the church would let me go. I expect food and shelter in your camp as well as the tools needed for my trade.
This is your bread and ale, Father. Join my company if you wish.
In that case, I'll come back with the goods.
Hello {playername}, what can I do for you?
Can you modify my equipment?
Your prices seem higher than the ones in town.
Nothing for now.

We're not in town are we?It's much more difficult to get resupplied in a camp, I can't make a contract with most suppliers without having a proper shop. So I have to pay a higher price for all the materials I purchase.
On the other hand I guarantee you that my work is of superior quality in spite of the conditions and that I offer a better selection than most towns.
Certainly, what did you have in mind?
Nevermind.
{playername}, I'll need {reg0} crowns to make up for the materials.
Fine by me.
I can't afford it at the moment.
Perhaps later.
{playername}, consider it done.
I packed my tools and personnal belonging, just help me carry this crate.
Let's move...
Greetings {sir/madam}, what brings you to a siege workshop?
What do you do here?
Simple curiosity, do you have any pieces for sale?
I just got lost, I thought this was the tavern.
We do, the bigger pieces are only on command though. Talk to the Master Engineer if you want to purchase a handgonne.
What's a handgonne?
I'll speak to him them.
A hand cannon, a firearm. It's like a crossbow but much more powerful, noisy and... expensive.
That's quite interesting.

I'm the Master Engineer's assistant, not for long as he has taken another apprentice. I've previously learned smithing, tailoring and tanning. Now I'm thinking of seeking employment until I can afford my own workshop.
You could work for me, there's always plenty to do in a camp.
Good luck then.
I don't see why not... It would allow me to travel a bit, see the world before I decide where to settle.
We'll sign a contract of dwelling, protection, access to food and to a workshop as well as a payment of 100 crowns up front.
Alright but no special treatment outside of having your workshop.
I need to think about this.
Buongiorno {playername}! What can I do for you amico mio?
Show me your wares.
Certamente {Signore/Signora}, only the best at the best prices for you!
Grazie {playername}
How's the bussiness going?
Nothing for now.
Bene {playername}, I hope to make enough profit to return to Italy. No offense, things are a bit too wild here.
Not enought for my taste!
I understand what you mean.
Grazie mille {Signore/Signora). Let's trade!
On the way...
Buongiorno {Signore/Signora}, may I interest you in an trade opportunity that you can't possibly miss?
Spit it out, merchant, crook, whoever you are I can smell it's a scam.
Go bother someone else.
Molto bene, I'm a merchant of good reputation I swear! I just need an investor to get my caravan bussiness going again.
Let me guess, I just happen to look like the right person for it?
Ah! Heard that one before, I'm not falling for it.
{Signore/Signora} per favore! I understand the skepticism, I've been stuck here for days trying to look for someone to help me out but I'm stuck here since my little misadventure.
Giovanni Conti is my name and I am a merchant from Firenze. My caravan got sacked by those cruel scuoiatori, flayers as you call them, I managed to run away with my life but I lost everything I had.

I'm trying to set up a new caravan but I don't have the means for it. I'm trying to leave this wretched place but I can't... Of the very few caravans that cross this place, none is taking in new members.
I'm not going to invest in a stranger but if you want I have a camp.
I've heard better sob stories.
Grazie, I'll do it just to leave this place but that doesn't get me back on bussiness. You see, I'm not the fighting type, do you get me? I pray you listen to my following offer.
500 crows, that's all I'm asking. I buy some goods and join your camp, I set up shop there and trade with you and the places we visit. Cosa dice?
Deal. Here's the money but I'm accompanying you until we reach the camp.
Stay put, I'll gather some crowns and I'll be back.
Certainly not!
Well, what do you expect?
We should depart...
How sad it is to venture to another country and realize that you've passed from one dimension into another. I should take the next boat to England
Where are you from? You have no accent.
In that case, bon voyage.
I'm Millan from Italy. I went on a long adventure, but now I'm leaving France, not having found an employer who would need my services.
Would you like to join my company? You look like a good fighter.
Good luck in England. Greet the Queen for me.
Well, it looks like I won't leave the good old France early, it will cost 150 crowns though.
Here are your crowns. Hold fast on the battlefield, I ask of you. No unnecessary deaths.
I can't pay that kind of money, maybe later.
Greetings, I hope that the letter for Montpellier is well in the hands of the Maistre of the Guild of merchants.
Well obviously, do you doubt me?
Perfect, I could dine and sleep better tonight thanks to you, here is your payment. See you soon, I hope.
Greetings, I hope that the letter for Marseille is well in the hands of the Maistre of the Guild of merchants.
Of course, it's done!
Perfect, I can think of other things now, this letter kept me from sleeping.
Greetings, I hope that the letter for Paris is well in the hands of the Maistre of the Guild of merchants.
Of course, it's done!
Perfect, I see I can count on you.
Greetings, I hope that the letter for Dijon is well in the hands of the Maistre of the Guild of merchants.
Of course, it's done!
Perfect, I see I can count on you.
Hello, I hope the letter for Caen arrived in its destination.
Of course!
Perfect, I'm sorry, but business has not been good lately, I can only pay you 50 crowns.
Hello, did you take the shipment from Bordeaux to the destination?
It is done.
Perfect, here is your pay.
Hello, did you take the shipment to Paris?
It is done.
Perfect. here is your pay.
Hello, did you take the shipment to Avignon?
It is done.
Good, here is your pay.
Hello, did you take the shipment to Reims?
It is done.
Good, here is your pay.
Greetings, I hope that the letter for Montpellier is well in the hands of the Maistre of the Guild of merchants.
Well obviously, do you doubt me?
Perfect, I could dine and sleep better tonight thanks to you, here is your payment. See you soon, I hope.

Perfect, I can think of other things now, this letter kept me from sleeping.

Of course, it's done!
Perfect, I see I can count on you.

Of course, it's done!
Perfect, I see I can count on you.
Hello, I hope the letter for Caen arrived in its destination.
Of course!
Perfect, I'm sorry, but business has not been good lately, I can only pay you 100 crowns.
Hello, did you take the shipment from Bordeaux to the destination?
It is done.
Pefect, here is your pay.
Hello, did you take the shipment from Paris to the destination?
It is done.
Perfect, here is your pay.
Hello, did you take the shipment to Avignon?
It is done.
Good, here is your pay.
Hello, did you take the shipment to Reims?
It is done.
Good, here is your pay.

Of course, it's done!
Perfect, I can think of other things now, this letter kept me from sleeping.

Of course, it's done!
Perfect, I see I can count on you.

Of course, it's done!
Perfect, I see I can count on you.

Of course!
Perfect, I'm sorry, but business has not been good lately, I can only pay you 100 crowns.
Hello, did you take the shipment from Bordeaux to the destination?
It is done.
Perfect, here is your pay.
Hello, did you take the shipment from Paris to the destination?
It is done.
Perfect, here is your pay.
Hello, weren't you supposed to take the shipment to Avignon?
It's done.
Good, here's your pay.
Hello, weren't you supposed to take the shipment to Reims?
It is done.
Good, here's your pay.
Greetings, I hope that the letter for Montpellier is well in the hands of the Maistre of the Guild of merchants.
Well obviously, do you doubt me?
Perfect, I could dine and sleep better tonight thanks to you, here is your payment. See you soon, I hope.
Greetings, I hope that the letter for Marseille is well in the hands of the Maistre of the Guild of merchants.
Of course, it's done!
Perfect, I can think of other things now, this letter kept me from sleeping.
Greetings, I hope that the letter for Paris is well in the hands of the Maistre of the Guild of merchants.
Of course, it's done!
Perfect, I see I can count on you.
Greetings, I hope that the letter for Dijon is well in the hands of the Maistre of the Guild of merchants.
Of course, it's done!
Perfect, I see I can count on you.
Hello, I hope the letter for Caen arrived in its destination.
Of course!
Perfect, I'm sorry, but business has not been good lately, I can only pay you 100 crowns.
Hello, did you take the shipment from Bordeaux to the destination?
It is done.
Perfect, here is your pay.
Hello, did you take the shipment from Paris to the destination?
It is done.
Perfect, here is your pay.
Hello, weren't you supposed to take the shipment to Avignon?
It is done.
Good, here is your pay.
Hello, weren't you supposed to take the shipment to Reims?
It is done.
Good, here is your pay.
Are you looking for work, sir? You could work as a courier, there is nothing simpler, I give you a letter or a package and you have to bring it to the receiver, what do you say?
I'm interested, tell me more.
I'm not a messenger, thank you.
What do you want to know?
How much will I get paid?
Do you have a letter or a package to deliver?
Do you have any advice to give me about the Art of being a Messenger?
Are there any other Guilds of Messengers in France?
That's all I wanted to know, thank you.

The distance does not matter, you will always be paid 150 crowns, it is the price of a circuit all over France, whether a letter is for a shoe maker who expects news of his family,  or even if it is for the king himself, it is the same rate.

Of course, there is one in Calais, in Bourges, Bordeaux and Marseille, if you are going to give a letter to a customer of Marseille, go to the representative of the Guild of this city to give you in turn a race, so you will not come back empty handed and  The circuit will become profitable, think about it.

Well, to bring a letter is not difficult in itself, but to travel as much distance as quickly as possible avoiding the bandit groups is not the easiest, travelling on deforested plains is often safer than crossing woods, you would not see Bandits in ambush that way too late.

But you can't afford to be sightseeing, a safer path is always longer, but the customer is waiting and that makes less money for you. Moreover I advise you to travel alone or with two or three other companions only, it is better to be quick to escape the bandits than to be accompanied by an escort that would slow you down, anyway, you could not pay guards of Mercenaries with your income, the Messenger life is simple, and made journeys of discoveries, but also full of dangers so be always on your guard.

And finally, I recommend you find a fast mount, even if it is a bit expensive, it represents a good investment to be able to complete the circuit faster. The messenger is clever above all, avoids pitfalls and knows how to take advantage of every situation.
Do you have any other questions?
Of course, you see there will always be more letters or packages to deliver, I happen to have something here now.
Yes, I have a letter that must reach the Guild master of the merchants of Montpellier as soon as possible, do you accept this circuit?
All right, I'll get it to Montpellier
I'm sorry, but I can't.
This is the first time I've seen a messenger refuse a mission, shame on you.
Well, take care of yourself and the merchandise.
Yes, I have a letter that must be sent in the most timely manner to the Guild Master of the merchants of Marseille, can you go there?
All right, I'll be in Marseille.

God, what a cold! Plus it's full of wolves around here...
Let's play dice for crowns...
If you are cold, a little training will heat you up.
Well, all accounts are made, captain, don't be so cold.
Stay on your guard...
I was going to ask you, we were going to die here.
I am a bit on edge because I do not like to have to fight in the forest.
Let's play for some crowns...
In the forest or elsewhere, the main thing is that we are superior in number or quality.
Well said Captain! Let's hope we match one of the two cases.
Stay cautious, even if we are hidden in the forest, other troops could hide there too...
Excellent idea! Nothing better to relax.
Captain... you should relax, we're watching the camp. Why don't you go around and look?
Let's play for some crowns...
You're right, I'm going to explore the surroundings.
All right, if we hear riders, we'll sound the alarm.
We leave soon, no need to wait.
Finally a little relaxation.
What beautiful confines, isn't it, captain?
Let's play for crowns...
Are you from around here?
No, but if I live long enough to have enough crowns, I would look for a land not far from here. .
We're leaving soon.
Good idea captain, if you have the crowns to lose, I would never have enough.
My lord... Finally, captain as they say, I do not know too much how it is that we must call you, I was just peasant sometimes, and here I am, armed... what a story!
Anything else, Captain? Is that right (captain)?
Call me what you feel at the moment.
Captain will suffice for now... and behave like an infantryman.
See you later...
Well that!... you're like a comrade to me, my lord. Ho I would follow your orders of course, but it is with admiration that I would do, nothing like a frank camaraderie!.
Nothing like that is true, and if you told me your story...
Good, see you later, I have things to do.

I was born in the north of France, near Caen, I work in the fields since I was park, then when the Anglois arrived, I left leaving my village, I took a job in the village where you saw me for the first time , and now I'm here? Talking about it with you... nothing interesting, but I never thought I would become a soldier.
Don't worry, everything's going to be all right.
Well... Of course captain, I would make efforts... still efforts. (mutters something underneath his beard).
Capitaine...I must take care of the horses, then I must sharpen the weapons.
Anything else to tell me, Captain?
Don't forget to rest.
So hurry up a little.
Do you know a story... an anecdote?.
Continue in this case.
Rest?.. Indeed captain, it's important that too, but how to close the eye with the sound of the forest?.
Try to fall asleep, why not after a little chat with your comrades?
Sleep as much as possible, I need all your strength, and no excess drink to sleep more easily.
It is exactly that... they are all afraid of the forest, and communicate to me their fear, it will not help me to fall asleep.
Think of another place, like the tavern.
Stop with that, you're not children anymore.
Ho!... This is a great idea captain, you are very strong, I see it.
Well, well, I could do faster if you don't get in the way.

If, now that you tell me, someone from the troop told me that not far from this forest, lives a strange witch. They say that she boils cats to make potions. Someone from the village saw her, and she quickly become a black wolf and ran through the woods!
Don't tell that to others, okay?.
You smell that?
I hope we stay tonight, I would still enjoy the smells.
The smell of the countryside?
If it's your own odor that you smell, go to the well and wash yourself, without delay.
I have to go, see you later.
Exactly, the smell of the returned land, the crops, the vines, no life is better than that of an honest worker.
It must not be so bad indeed.
It must be terrible to be held back somewhere, nothing better than liberty.
Ho, it's true you can believe me, get up in the field at the crow of the rooster at dawn, work in the sun, and live from his toil.
A simple and peaceful life.
Work again and again...I do not know if it is the life for me, I prefer a dangerous but more exciting life.
A peaceful life yes... Then came the war, and we had to give up our burned fields and leave behind the remains of our burned farms, these dogs we will pay for it all!
Bha, I'll go if it's an order, but as everyone senses that smell, I didn't think it would bother anyone.
Why camp on the edge of the grand route, captain?
All right, but I still don't understand why we're camping here, with all due respect.
Why not?
Would you take Me for a thief by any chance? I do not want to attack the merchants rest assured.
We'll talk about that later.
No, it's just that if the enemy host went through the...
Well if the enemy has the right to take the big road why not us?
It's none of your business, let me lead and just attack the enemy.
I appreciate your courage, captain, but it's still very dangerous.
Sometimes you have to take the shortest ways, do not worry I have the situation in hand.
Camp here where elsewhere... The enemy is everywhere you know.
Hum...I am convinced captain, we have no choice, forgive me for doubting you.
Sorry, but I have things to do.
Not too cold, captain?
Let's sing for us to heat up.
I'm going to go for a walk to warm my legs.
You might as well walk on fire, for God's sake it's cold in the north.
Excellent idea, I can teach you a song from my village... that of memories...
Let's sing and drink...
I don't like sleeping in the woods, captain.
Sing in your heart, so you won't think about it.
There is nothing diabolical in a forest, just idiots who are afraid.
Bah, if you say so, you'll be fine tonight...
If you want, I remember a song from my hometown.
Are you sure you didn't hear it in a tavern?
What a peaceful place it seems that there has never been war here.
Would you sing a melody?
Get some rest, see you later.
Yes, with pleasure, I was a troubadour.
I guessed your way of holding your sword.
It feels good to stop a bit and rest in front of a fire.
Doesn't that inspire a song?
Enjoy, we leave soon.
Of course, if it makes you happy.
I took the first round of guard, Sir, I'm watching the camp because of the wolves.
And what do you do if a pack comes into the camp?.
Good luck.
Capitaine...I am not an idiot, wolves are afraid of fire, moreover if a pack attacked, I would have time to kill some of them before alerting the camp.
That's fine, and what would you do against a pack of the English?
Ben the same thing, except that they are not afraid of a fire.
Have you seen it?.
Who's that?
A serf! Of all beauty, I almost shot him but he ran away.
It was his day and not yours.
It's a pity.
Let's leave whenever you are ready.
Nothing to report, the road is quiet.
Not even a merchant convoy?
No, I hope we have everything we need.
Captain, we've been waiting for you. What are the guidelines?
Let's prepare for the next battle...
Tell me about this place.
At rest for now.
We are under the command tent, here we meet to decide the operations, it seems obvious... do you feel good, sir?
What should I tell the men?
Tell everyone not to try anything and wait in position.
Tell everyone to charge at the sight of the enemy.
Tell the infantrymen...
Tell the Knights...
Tell the Archers...
Let's start from the beginning, I'm lost.
Yes ?
Yes ?
Yes ?
Understood.
Understood.
Understood.
Let them hold the position.
They charge at the sight of the enemy.
They have to follow me.
Let them stop following me.
Let them walk in front of the Archers.
Let them stop putting themselves in front of the Archers.
Let them step back ten steps.
Let them stop stepping back ten steps.
That they must tighten their ranks.
Let them not tighten their ranks.
That they should disperse their rank.
Let them stop dispersing their ranks.
That'll be all for the infantry.
Let them hold the position.
They charge at the sight of the enemy.
They have to follow me.
Let them stop following me.
Let them walk in front of the Archers.
Let them stop putting themselves in front of the Archers.
Let them step back ten steps.

That they must tighten their ranks.
That they stop tightening their ranks.

Let them stop dispersing their ranks.
That'll be all for the cavalry.
They have to wait for my signal to fire.
They have to shoot at sight.
They have to wait for my signal to charge.
That they have to charge when they see the enemy.
They have to follow me.
They have to stop following me.
That they must advance ten steps.
That they should no longer advance by ten steps.
That they must step back by ten steps.
That they have to stop stepping back ten steps.

Enough about The Archers.
Let's move on to something else.
Good...
As you like...

Do you need anything else?
Captain, we have compiled a list of descriptions of the walls of the most interesting fortresses in France. You should definitely take a look.
Of course.
I do not care.

Of course.
