Of course.
I do not care.
My handsome prince, I've waited for you so long...
Have we met?
You chose the wrong person, goodbye.
No, not yet, but for 200 crowns, we can get fully acquainted with each other in the privacy of an inn.
I might be interested.
I don't have time for that, woman!
You will forget the war in the embrace of my arms.
I don't promise you to be as sweet as you.
My lord, I beg you, I need money, I'm ready for anything.
You were saying?
I'm in the same situation, but I don't beg anyone, farewell.

Well, I'm ashamed to say it, but I come from a noble family. My father was a wealthy merchant who got murdered by thugs. I have no-one to watch over me, and... this is what I've had to resort to in order to survive. I need 300 crowns, my lord...
300 crowns for a lady of the court, interesting...
Don't worry my dear, I'll give you the 300 crowns, so you won't have to get down and dirty.
Thank you, you are a true knight of the old times. I could never thank you enough, everyone will know what a hero you are.
Unfortunately, I can't help you.
I don't like the nobles, farewell.
Ha! I don't lie... you may think I invented a sob story to charge you more money, but there is nothing fake, I assure you.
I know that you are truly noble, you feel so good...
Approach vigorous stranger, what would you say to a visit to the stables with me. For 200 crowns, naturally.
Why to the stables?
Not now.
Why not, it isn't far from the street and I love the place, it brings out the animal within us.
Animal, huh...
You're sick woman, go and find a healer.
Exactly, I love doing it among those powerful beasts.
I think you'd make a good shepherdess.
Silence, go back to your pigs.
Okay, my lord.
Why go to the village, if I have two beautiful pigs in front of me?
What? I'll teach you to respect your master.
Go away, you stink.
Okay, my lord.
I wonder if it was you or your horse that produced the smell?
What? I'll teach you to respect your master.
Is it done? Well... now hang him!
You were right... Governor.
You're starting to annoy me, what are you talking about again?
When you said I was a bad omen... (fight with the governor)
What is this...
So, have you finished?
I need to know what this man has done.
He disobeyed orders, robbed his fellows and is guilty of murder. Is that enough?
With respect, I don't believe a word.
That's more than enough, my lord. You are within your rights, there's no doubt.
Who is this insolent? How dare you speak to me without being asked?
Apologies my lord, but that's going on here?
We're going to hang this man. Why does he look at you, do you want to perhaps join?
It turns out that I'm a priest, my lord. Let me at least give him the last rites.
No, not at all, I was just going to resume my way to fame and fortune with my lord.
I have a feeling that if you don't do this, it'll attract the misfortune to my house. Go away as soon as you're done, you're a bad omen.
What are you doing? Give the signal, I'm ready to die.
Bon voyage old man, you'll be a hero.
What are you doing, stranger? Run away.
I'll kill the governor. Support me, fight or die a free man!
Yes... yes, okay, a free man.
Wait for my signal, and throw yourself at the knights by St. Michael.
Yes, yes... I'm a free man!
Who are you? I tell you, the governor is even crazier than usual. I'm going to the village and tell them to rebel. For me it is too late.
What do you mean?
The governor wants to hang me, just because I don't run fast enough according to him. The worst is that he wants my son to be the executioner.
I'm here to kill the governor, lend me a hand and get a chance to live.
Well, I don't know... I can't promise anything.
What should I do, what should I do?
Calm down. What's up?
The governor, he wants me to hang my father.
I'll take care of the governor, go help your father.
What?
A strong drink?
Of course...
What do you want from me, rascal?
Who are you?
I didn't want to disturb you, my lord.
Such insolence!
What do you want?
A strong drink?
Finally, you took your time...
That clown, why do you bother?
Are you the master of this house?
I didn't want to disturb you, my lord.
I'll talk about these matters with the cook. He'll tell you how to serve, idiot.
Yes?
A strong drink?
Naturally...
Why do you look like that?
Are you the master in this house?
My apologies, my lord.
No, I'm not the master. I'll take your order to the cook.
Wind...
Who is the master in this house?
My apologies.
You didn't hear? Wind...
Don't just stand there, rascal. Go into the kitchen, you are preventing me from to seeing to the needs of my master.
Which one is your master?
My apologies.
Do you want to be thrown out to the mud covered alley?
You serve strong drinks to the guests?
That or is there something else to serve?
No, the meal is not ready to be served... make yourself useful in the meantime.
Hey there, who are you? Did you come to steal provisions?
No way, the guild master sent me to lend a hand. He told me that you needed help for the serving of the day.
I'm going.
Hmm... that fool should stop sending us all of these starving peasants. Well, since you're here, make yourself useful. Bring drinks to the guests.
Everyone is going to drink?
What are you talking about? No, please don't give in to the master, alcohol is prohibited. Serve others, understand? All of the guests besides the master...
I feel better and better, let me now.
Well... if there's nothing else to do, I'll leave...
I... don't feel very good, where's the damn doctor?
I'm going to fetch him, my lord...
What else?
I have your potion.
I was going...
At last! Give it to me.
(give the potion)
(attempt to pour in poison quietly)
It's always the taste of a pig dung. Hope at least it'll be effective.
It's always the taste of a pig dung. Hope at least it'll be effective.
I hope so too, my lord...
What else?
Free ale?
I was going...
Take this... I can't drink alcohol, my doctor refuses to treat me. Take that... fast.
Another servant? Should there be so many serfs to serve this house?
Who are you?
I was going...
My dear, what education have you received?
Don't stand next to me.
What are you doing?
I was going...
Why are you bothering me? I'm preparing a potion for the master. If I fail I might get fired, understand?
When is the potion going to be ready?
I was going...
Well, it's ready and it's perfectly successful this time, yes!
May I come to see the master?
I congratulate you, goodbye.
Nope. It's up to me to take that.
Please, let me make myself useful. If I'm not working, my family will have nothing to eat again tonight...
Silence! All right, take the potion, but I want no more trouble from you, understood?
Oh, but this is our digger...
I want to go back.
I'm going...
You're crazy, no doubt you can get in there, but I'll charge 100 crowns for that.
That's up to you now. I'm busy.
I don't have the money, I'll be back.
After you, my lord... Ha, ha, ha!
Oh, we're not going away.
What was he doing behind that door?
I'm going...

If you don't know, these are the catacombs. It used to be a subterranean quarry. Now it's used to store the victims of the plague, so we reduce the the risk of infection spreading in Paris. Is your curiosity satisfied? Well, take a hike.
I still want to take a look.
Okay, I'm going.
No way, entry is prohibited. Why do you think I'm here?
For 100 crowns, will you let me?
Okay, I'm going.
150 crowns, not more.
And after all, what do I have to do...
Hopefully I didn't spend money for nothing.
I don't have the money, I'll be back later.
That's your business... like you'll need this. Enter fast so no-one sees you.
What can I do for you?
I want to talk to the high authority of the church.
I'm just passing through.
Well, the Cardinal is just next to you. Don't bother him with political affairs, please.
Yes, what do you want?
I want to talk to the high authority of the church.
I'm just passing through.
Well, the Cardinal is just next to you. Don't bother him with political affairs, please.
I don't like to speak with men at arms, but what do you want?
My lord, I want to make a donation to be forgiven of my sins. [Controversial]
I wish to make a donation to your prayers to make me victorious in battle. [Renown]
My lord, couldn't you interfere with the other christian factions to achieve truce? [Diplomacy]
My lord, couldn't you interfere with the other christian factions to achieve truce? [Diplomacy]
I won't trouble you more...
If you haven't behaved like a good christian, but your repentance is sincere, I can act on your behalf. For a gesture of 3000 crowns towards the church, I will intervene in your favor.
Naturally, here's 3000 crowns. This amount can help the church and make amends for my actions.
It's more expensive than a ransom!
How dare you?!
Please forgive me my lord, I'll come back with the money.
You are an example for all christians! How much are you willing to donate to the funds of the holy mother church?
300 crowns.
800 crowns.
2000 crowns!
I can't for the moment, but I'll think of my lord.
Well... it always helps a little... I thank you for this, my time is precious, you know...
You show great integrity, your devotion will be known to all for sure.
Thank you. You are one of the largest donors and your faith is remarkable. The people will pray for you and your name will be showered with praise, I'm sure!
It's significant that you'd want peace in that unfortunate country, who are you exactly?
We should try to improve relations between France and England.
Indeed, although I doubt that my words can make things happen, but we must try again.
We should try to improve relations between France and Burgundy.

England and their ally Burgundy might be willing to reduce attacks on France, but how can we be sure that Dauphin Charles won't take the opportunity to attack them? I should be careful with my words. I'll speak with the Duke of Burgundy first and see if he's willing to accept truce. Ideally the Burgundians stay neutral in this matter and let France and England settle this matter with honor and diplomacy rather than by blood.
We should try to improve relations between England and Burgundy.

It's preferable that the English and the Burgundians do not kill each other. The situation is delicate and as a representative of the Christians I have to make sure that both sides don't engage in uncontrollable killing.
We should try to improve relations between France and Brittany.

It's preferable that the Armagnacs and the Bretons do not kill each other. The situation is delicate and as a representative of the Christians I have to make sure that both sides don't engage in uncontrollable killing.
I don't think it will work...
How dare you talk about peace? You aren't the best person to lead honest negotiations... stop wasting my time, please.

I'll be back.

Great God, if you couldn't pay, you'd risk the worst kind of trouble. I fear you'd become an outlaw in our country. You'd alienate many people, not to mention there would be no more loans. Believe me, it's better you repay.
How much do you need? I'll take 10 percent extra as interest upon repayment.
I need 3000 crowns.
